Review: This is better then the normal wifi adapter, it does catch signals from distance and provides quite a steedy connection, works on 2.4 g not as fast as it is written.In my case i should have bought the dual band adapter for 5g speed, 😥, but i bought this. So if you are buying adapter for dual band router, buy 5 g adapter.

Subject: Gotta love it
Review: This is a lifesaver. My desktop PC's Wi-Fi adapter died and I needed something that could use the speed my router was putting out. This one worked like a charm. My only gripe, if I can call it that - similar to my TP-LINK router, this requires a restart once in a while or it slows down. Other than that, it works very well.

Subject: Yes Its Version 2. But It Supports Monitoring Mode as well as Packet Injection.
Review: The Product is Very Good.Well The Range Is Really good.But The Imp Thing To know isIt has monitoring mode and packet injection.but we have to enable it through some commands.Yes It also supports in linux.You Just have to install the driver of linux from its official website.I personally used it for peniteration testing as well as for Internet Access.It was good in both of it.So Don't worry If someone says you that it is v2 and v1 only supports monitoring modeOr something like it doesn't work with linux.These are just rumors.Thankyou.

Subject: Connects to Weak wifi network
Review: i have a very weak wifi network in my office. The laptop could not provide a stable internet connection. This wifi booster has enhanced the wifi signal by 10 times ( Signal was POOR earlier, now it is GOOD). I have a stable internet connection and it connects automatically.A must buy if you want to sneak into neighbours wifi network ;)I got same day delivery and am happy with the packing.

Subject: Good one, but not satisfactory on speed.
Review: Auto detect drivers in Windows 10.Need addition setup provided in CD for windows 7.I have office system windows 10 installed with No optical drive and prohibited USB storage. And was able to auto detect device in restricted mode to use wifi.But if you have win 7, then you need to install drivers manually.I got around 12 mbps download and 15 mbps upload speed on speed test by OOKLA. where as at same time on same website i got 54mbps download and 68 mbps on LAN connection.So, speed variations are quite high even if TP Links says it to have 300mbps.

Subject: Excellent product with very reasonable cost.
Review: Though nano size excellent performance. Continuous & uninterrupted catching the signal from router to my pc placed away around 7 feet.  Ofcourse I'm using the TP-Link router for the past 3 years no problem recently I shifted my router,  to avoid wiring connection for a distance of 7 feet I opted for this link happy & satisfied towards performance & cost.Even the product delivered on time.  Thanks Amazon.

Subject: Good Product
Review: Needed to install the driver on my windows 10 laptop. After that I can see it reading signals from both 2.5Ghz and 5Ghz bands. Earlier the 5Ghz band was missing (maybe because laptop is an older generation model). Moreover Tp link have a long experience in the wireless domain and they proved it with this product.

Subject: Magical - The best WiFi receiver in town!
Review: My home router has always been TP-Link. I'm their loyal customer because of the quality and simplicity of their products. This WiFi receiver works like a charm. I had zero issues installing the device drivers and the whole process was completed within 5 minutes. This is cute, little beast is a saviour! Special thanks to Amazon for the ultra-superfast delivery within 1 day! It's because of you, I can work from home peacefully.

Subject: BEST OF ALL THE PRODUCTS
Review: It is very useful product I was using from past 2 years still it is not got any problemUSB wi-fi adapter: 802.11N N300 speed allows for great video streaming and internet calling experienceIncreased range: dual external antennas deliver enhanced reception and transmission performanceSecure wi-fi: easy one-touch wireless security encryption with the quick security setup buttonJD power ranked TP-Link "highest in customer satisfaction for wireless routers in 2017"Compatibility: windows (XP/7/8/8.1/10) - Mac OS (10.6~10.11) - Linux Kernal (2.6.18~3.10.10)Supports windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1, Mac OS X 10.7~10.10, LinuxSpeeds up to 300Mbps for lag-free HD streaming and online gamingSo I request you to take this product

Subject: Great Delivery. Must have !  Pentesters you know why  !
Review: Loved the product. As I use Linux so recently I was facing issues with my inbuilt laptop WiFi adapter. This adapter helped solve my problems. No software installation required on popular Linux distros and Windows 10. Though for W10 I suggest reinstalling the drivers from device manager just to keep the latest software patch. I must say the product is really good, negligible latency for me and most important a must have for pentesters !Easy to use -5/5Price - 5/5Delivery - 5/5 (very fast)Final verdict -5/5 for the price you pay you get a very decent budget usb WiFi adapter.In case you have a very high budget for WiFi adapter do check the company called Alfa.

Subject: Easy to use and strong wife signal received.
Review: So simple to use. Just plug it in and it installs itself. I’m no techie and I installed it right away and no issues with operation so far in the past 1 month.It’s also really tiny so it’s pretty discreet and does not jut out awkwardly.I’m happy with the performance and design.If you found this review helpful pls rate me. It encourages me to keep reviewing. 😀

Subject: Go for it  !!
Review: Simple things like these make life easy and smart.My old desk top was not WiFi enabled so this little gadget fills the gap and voila my old computer gets upgraded.Good speed and connectivity .... Does the job it is meant for...Worth the money spent 👍

Subject: Waste of Money
Review: Keeps disconnecting on a genuine win 10 desktop - tried in multiple USB ports and tried removing and reinstalling the drivers also multiple times - keeps disconnecting even when the WiFi router is right next to itNormally the router is just 10 - 12 feet away which in itself is quite nearbyCan't return or replace - frustrated that i wasted Rs 769 on this crapI had thought TP-link was a respected brand but so disappointing with this purchaseAlso FYI - Wifi Connection on phone and laptops works perfectly fine while this test was done

Subject: Removes the wired dependency for Gaming rigs.
Review: Okay, this is one of the good ones. If you are getting high ping every 5 seconds, uninstall the driver installed by Windows, head straight to TP link website and get the lastest driver from there. Highly reliable adapter. I am using this for WZ with constant latency of 70ms.

Subject: Wifi not working within one month use...pls not go for this product
Review: Very bad product, I was purchase this product in July month and within one month, this tp link wifi dongle start making trouble, now it not able to connect my computer, total waste of money. Wifi is not working.

Subject: Perfect for A320M Motherboards!!!
Review: Wonderful product, getting suprfast speed as mentioned on its specifcation.TP link is a good brand.I have windows 10, just plug the WiFi Adapter, no need to install the driver. Works perfectly on my Asus A320M Motherboard with AMD Ryzen APU.Easy to install, just plug it and use it.WiFi range is also very good.Recommend for those who are thinking for a good WiFi doungle in just 500-550₹.

Subject: Good; so far
Review: Ordered this product as my WiFi & USB tethering in my 10 y.o laptop failed. This is my 24 hr usage review.Delivery was prompt and came a day earlier. Cheers to Amazon for that considering it was the lockdown period. Package was sealed tight and the product was well packed inside. Set up was quick and easy. It is 1/4th of a big USB drive we know so it blends in with laptop without poking out too much.Speed of the connection doesn't change but the connectivity is good. No issues to report this far. Will update this review maybe after 6months or a full year.Worth buying if your laptop/PC's connectivity is fried and you need a cost-effective alternative.

Subject: Good Product(Cons is it is made in china)
Review: Good product. Initially after 8 days I have tried for different computer observed it was not working. But it might be driver related issue. It is working fine. I am satisfied.Only Cons is it is made in china. It will take time to get rid of that disease. I observed that after return period was over otherwise it would have return that product as I vow to try my best with chinese product.

Subject: Best option for PC internet.
Review: Best best best for pc who wants to connect internet from wi fi ...very easy to use . CD is available but no need of it. Just plug in CPU and wifi is available just connect . In this lockdown period when we needs to work from home very much thankful to amazon such gr8 service...

Subject: Nice and cheap.
Review: My wi-fi router is, like, right next to the cabinet, so the signal has been excellent for me. I have been using this dongle for almost two years, and it's been working flawlessly. I am merely using a plan of 20 Mbps, so I cannot speak about how good the dongle is for much higher speed.Don't just plug-n-play, install the software via windows update and through the website of TP Link.

Subject: Excellent Signal Reception Strength and very negligible speed drop
Review: In my room the WiFi signal received is very weak but still by connecting this device to my laptop full WiFi signal is shown in my laptop WiFi signal status icon. Speed is also excellent. The only problem is that I received a broken driver CD with this device but that didn't matter as its driver was easily available on the TP-Link website. Due to this I have given 1 star less. Although drivers are not needed for Windows 10 devices using this product. It was very easy to install and to use it.

Subject: Very good WiFi adaptor but replacement is older
Review: Range is very good..... good product. Two star deducted because of seller, Amazon didn't even know about that the replacement product seller send is older version of adaptor ie version 2, original product delivered was latest one ie version 3. Amazon please don't do replacement for product if your seller send old product incase........very dissatisfied & disappointed.

Subject: Good so far
Review: Bought it for my dad as he used to get terrible reception from his previous smaller usb receiver device. It was really easy to install, connect and use! And after few weeks of using it, the WiFi on his desktop is also a lot better than before (from 1 or 2 bars to all 5 bars of signal!!).Would definitely recommend this product! Also because it was a longer usb cable, I could move the receiver much closer to my crappy modem and by adjusting the receiver antenna correctly (90 degree perpendicular), the signal strength received is also excellent!

Subject: need software upgrades.
Review: its completely dependent on tp link wps software. but the software its self crashes in the middle. making it loses connection. the software also need proper updates in area like. " wifi connection still shows connected but no internet connection. even though the phone and all in wifi connection are well connected to internet " i mean the program gives hangs you out without doing much.

Subject: Good replacement WiFi dongle
Review: The installation of the WiFi drivers was easy enough, but I wish some other media other than a CD/DVD was provided. My laptop did not have a optical drive and I had to copy the drivers into an older machine and then copy them back to the laptop using an USB drive.Once the installation was done, the usage was a breeze. You would be able to find a WiFi2 device added which will discover near by WiFi connections just as easy as before.

Subject: Go for it specially for Car AVN
Review: Worked well for my Honda city WiFi....no need of any download, worked like plug n play. If you are thinking, go for it !

Subject: Failed to work in Linux OS
Review: It was supposed to work in Linux based system as per product description but it did not work though very old adapter was working. It was Arch linux where I was trying to install it. Amazon should review its product description.

Subject: The Budget Friendly Wifi Adapter for Desktop
Review: I bought this product in August 2020 and this had been absolute joy to use, all I did was Plug it in the USB Port and It's Ready to Use, speeds have been wonderful- It's catching 100 Mbps as per my current Internet Plan & it's the best option for those who don't want to hook themselves to a LAN Cable & use the desktop without Internet Wire. Twenty first century has made us habitual to go wireless, I really thank TP Link who had put this product forward to us. I give it 10/10 !!

Subject: Pocket rocket!!!
Review: Currently I have 3 of these at my home. I first bought this for my old desktop since it had no inbuilt WiFi adapter. Next I bought it for me and my moms laptop as we were facing WiFi adapter issues. Works without the drivers..just plug and play... Must buy if you are facing wifi adapter issues. Works flawlessly. Cheaper than getting inbuilt WiFi adapter replaced.

Subject: Misleading Specifications - device cannot find my home network
Review: TL-WN725N cannot find my home router, but can find other networks in the vicinity. After plugging in and installing drivers using the CD provided, the LED status looked good and it could also detect WiFi signals around us, including our mobile hotspot. After a lot of debugging turns out that as mentioned in their specifications, this device is NOT compatible with the WPA2-PSK. My router was using this network authentication mode, and after changing the router configuration to use WPA-PSK for neetwork authentication, the network was being detected and the connection went just fine.On the box and the Amazon website it says it is compatible with WPA2-PSK, but I have my doubts.

Subject: Useful little one for my desktop
Review: Bought it for my desktop that was in a separate room that required my old router to be used as a range extender. I was unsure about the range but happy that I went for it. The range is really good. While even my phone struggles to get signal from my main wifi router, this little one, connected to desktop offloads HD youtube content on desktop screen with ease.

Subject: You can browse desktops without wires
Review: ProsTplink brand is the best in routers and related networking peripheralsJust follow the user guide instructions then you can connect wifiYou can use this tplink product to connect shareit to your desktop computer.price is very lowconsNo cons

Subject: Great to extend wifi range of your laptop
Review: Great wifi signal. I used it to extend the range of my laptop as I had a dead spot in the region of my room. I see the wifi strength at same location has doubled. Also, it is quite compact and doesn’t eat up much space. Just plug in to usb and install the driver from tp link website and you are good to go.

Subject: Best quality and build
Review: Recived one day before expected delivery date so thanks to Amazon fulfilled, amazing product packaging and build quality is very nice,Very easy to install even I haven't use CD I directly go to to link website and download drivers it is very easy and only take 3 minutes for it,Buy in my condition I am getting 72Mbps speed which is less than 300Mbps as shown on packaging(you can see in my photo also) and in specificationsand while using mobile hotspot if mobile moves to second room it is not connected it automatically disconnect and again connectedOver all I think it is good product except these points

Subject: Sturdy and stylish
Review: The adapter is small but you still have to be careful because it might break or damage the USB port if you insert the laptop into the bag the wrong way.Connection speed is fast. The range is short... You need to be near the wifi router to get the best signal.It is a decent buy if they reduce the price.

Subject: Good product but not the driver disc..
Review: Signal capturing is very good. U can even place your router corner of the room but still this adapter will provide u fluent net speed.The driver disc came with this adapter didn't worked at all so I download the drivers from official site of tp link.Pro tip: if u want to download drivers for win10 then download the specific win10 driver (not the 50mb driver bundle) which is around 10mb , it will surely work.

Subject: This version of TP link doesnt support monitor mode
Review: I have searched in google and was expecting atheros chipset inside this wireless adapter. But instead the one which came contains realtek chipset which doesnt support monitor mode for kali linux. Totally dissapointed . No where the version has mentioned for this adapter due to whcih people can get fooled.

Subject: Good product worst packing.
Review: Writing this review after using the product for couple of days.Cons:Again received the product with damaged packing. I didn't return the product because it's working fine. 2 stars less only for packing. Looks like some one opened the package during transit , torn inside too.Pros:Very good product . No installation required worked like a charm.Did a speed test , touching 80mbps speed (100mbps wifi router) whichbis good.Very small and compact.Comes with a CD if you don't have driver software.

Subject: I Got Used One. This thing is not acceptable from Amazon.
Review: I Got Used One. This thing is not acceptable from Amazon. I m really shocked that in amazon also that type of worst things happen! Need to fix this ! Product is working fine . But lots of scratches already on it. I have useing amazon from last 10 yrs but thibgs getting worst day by day from Product to Delivery everything is getting worst now.

Subject: Very high quality!!
Review: It is just plug and play with windows 10 , you don't even need to use driver CD.Very small in size, you can just leave it plugged in usb slot.This is second time I'm buying this product.1st one i bought (from local store) in 2015 and is still working fine even in 2019 , so decided to buy one more same model for my new pc build.

Subject: Does not have drivers for linux - waste of money
Review: Does not have compatible drivers for Ubuntu 18.04. Wasted money on this, disappointed

Subject: Very low speeds with this adapter and frequent disconnects
Review: Randomly disconnects from internet all times.Speeds are terrible. Did speed test on both my phone and PC (USB wifi adapter) to verify and getting less than one tenth of the Internet speed most of the times. Rarely it reaches even one fifth of my Internet speed ie 50Mbps. It stays in 1.5 to 10 Mbps. Many times even less than that!Tried all fixes like driver update and reinstall but it's useless.

Subject: Bad drivers from TP Link...!
Review: Bad drivers are providerd in CD and also in website... These TP link drivers have some issues on wifi hotspot and wifi receiving from some devices..... Tested in Windoes 7 and 8.TP link also not provided utility software.I solved this problem by uninstalling TP link drivers, and installng latest "Realtek wireless USB drivers" recommended by "driver pack solution online setup"......Driver version 1030.26.801.2017 (31-1-2018)After installing latest Realtek drivers everything works fine....Also installed Realtek utility software for switching hotspot and recever....

Subject: WIFI dongle which works with MACOS Catalina
Review: I needed this wifi dongle as my macbook was not recognising it's wifi card..The dongle is excellent...easy to install..speeds are great and it'a everything that it promised to be..Also delivered in a sealed pack with all accessories needed

Subject: Low cost but a quality product with awesome performance.
Review: I am totally satisfied with this TP-Link mini USB Adapter. It is easy to install and super easy to use. Awesome wifi signal receiver with great performance. For the first time, you have to install the driver for this USB adapter after that any time when you want to use it just plug in your device into your PC/MAC/LAPTOP and enjoy high-speed internet. Highly recommended product for everyone.

Subject: Very stable.
Review: Product works are described. WiFi signal strength is good and stable even when the device is 18ft away from access point. V3 has no support for Monitor Mode and Packet Injection. But I've found some online forums that states this device to be working in Monitor mode. I have not tried them as I have another WLAN device for that purpose.

Subject: Works with MAC - Perfect product
Review: My old mac had a issue with it's wifi adapter.I tried a 2-3 wifi dongle (The Chinese ones) and even a iball one, but none of them worked with my old mac.Finally I found this one and it's working perfectly with my mac.If your wifi adapter is not working with mac.. don't waste your time and money on substandard products, but simply buy this one.

Subject: Does not work with Linux
Review: The product claims compatibility with Linux, but it is not even being detected in my Ubuntu system. Have spent hours trying to find go-arounds on the internet without any success. All in all, complete waste of time and money.DO NOT BUY THIS IF YOU HAVE A LINUX SYSTEM

Subject: Reasonable one
Review: this comes with a cd; so if you are having desktop then you need to download the app from the CD for the system to identity the instrument; my desktop has cd drive so was not a problem; on my laptop it just worked without any downloading stuff at all...on the speed i need to wait as I do not know if my router is faulty or network is bad

Subject: Just Plug and Play!
Review: I bought it so that I can keep my WiFi router away from the computer and have my computer connect to it wirelessly. My router is an I-Ball Baton 150m, so I bought this model of TP-Link as it suits perfectly. I am using Windows 10 Home and this device just plugged in and started working, the CD included was not required at all! I really loved this product since the moment I plugged it in.

Subject: Quality Product.
Review: I got the item today. I am so happy to get this item. I mean the packaging and the quality is awesome. Installation is so simple. Just insert into the USB and and install the disc. There you go. Its all set. Works perfectly. Good speed and connection. Overall item is good. One thing to notice is that, don't buy the item if the price is above 500. Sometimes i saw that the price is higher. Only checkout the item for the price of 499 or below.

Subject: It hangs and one needs to plug it out and replug it into the system to make it functional
Review: This is a cheat product. It does not function as it should. It Disconnects several times, one has to be very patient to plug it out and plug it in once again to have the wireless access.

Subject: This Rating includes all the models of TP link and from all countries
Review: Extremely poor coverage......won't work in from one room to another......these reviews are to confuse you.......reviews from all models and types included,from all countries......this is to fool the customer.......doesn't give a clear picture of the rating and review of product model you have selected

Subject: Totally horrible and hopeless experience
Review: I got this adapter on 27th July, 2020. After 3days it stops working!!It's disconnecting constantly.Totally horrible, hopeless experience from Amazon. Don't cheat with your consumer like this.

Subject: Good Product and performance as specified.
Review: The product what I ordered was delivered in a tampered packaging and wrong product seen inside transparent packaging. On request for replacement, a prompt delivery of original product was in next 2 days. The product is easy to install and use. I did not really measure the speed etc, but it provides a seamless wifi connection from my mobile hotspot to PC. A long term pain of connecting mobile physically to PC is resolved finally!!!

Subject: Version 3.0 review for Macbooks.
Review: The product was working seamlessly. Many people out there are confused with the adapters version so i got ver3.0 and it works fine with macbooks too. My verdict is that you could buy this happily and you can easily install the drivers from tplink website(for Macbooks too) and then you're good to go. The picture shows the actual product as many pictures in the customer images are misleading so you can refer to the picture posted for actual product. The device fits in the width of two fingers as shown above in picture not too big or small. Overall its a good product.

Subject: Product quality  & Service is good but price slab is totally fake.
Review: Product is good but the Product price slab is totally fake by which is shown through Amazon payments bill page (softcopy or Hard copy).Amazon & Seller both are cheated with every customer who buy from Amazon....!!!

Subject: Value for money
Review: The range is as advertised n can detect signals even if the source is in another room or another floor.My net speeds never really reach 300mbps but i can confirm tht it gives upto 100mbps easily.Although its not plug and play, the installation cd provided with it is pretty simple to use. Overall great product

Subject: Didn't work at all.
Review: The installation was fine but as soon as I tried to connect it to a WIFI router it restarted. I figured out IT SHOULD BE USED ONLY IN A 3.0 USB PORT. Don't use it in a USB 2.0 it wont work. Even after using it in a 3.0 port mine one didn't work. Hence I returned.

Subject: Captures only 20 mbps
Review: It captures only 20 mbps speed of my 100 mbps connection when a nearby kept phone shows entire 100 mbps speed.single band - so does not detect 5 GHz channel.

Subject: Go for the bigger adapter.
Review: Its a good product, the setup was easy just insert the disc that comes with the package and it installs the necessary drivers. However the as for the signal strength its fine if the router is close by but if you're in another room then it really slows down the speeds. So my suggestion is please go for the any bigger adapter preferably with an antenna cause that'll give you much faster speeds(limited to your internet connection) and much much much better wifi signal.A good product overall.

Subject: pathetic WIFI signal strength and getting 2mbps speed in 2020 with my 100MBPS internet connection
Review: I feel i got scammed byAPPAARIO Retail and TP link as i don't even have option to return my product, best i could do is replace the product for same product.. TP-Link TL-WN725N 150Mbps Wireless N Nano is providing me 2 mbps speed, and pathetic wifi signal strength.. good for nothing

Subject: 100% working with cp plus dvr model cp-uvr0801e1-v4
Review: TP-Link TL-WN823N 300Mbps is 100% compactable and working with cp plus dvr. No problem at all. Plug in the usb port of the dvr restart the dvr and go to the wifi menu of the dvr. Open the mobile hotspot , this product immediately shows the available wifi connection; click the connect button and enter the password, within in few seconds it connect to internet. It is very much useful for mobile view.

Subject: Linux Driver Not Available
Review: Linux driver not available in cd. I purchased for RHEL 7. no issue with windows.Must include driver with proper installation procedure.

Subject: Great Buy, Recommended.
Review: In today's era(2019), I can't see desktops are not coming inbuilt wifi adapters, And, So This product from TP LINK is the best who are looking to connect their desktops with mobile Hotspot for internet sharing.The product came to me well packaged and arranged.Working great, no issues while installing drivers (CD given by manufacturer ) and using it for Windows 7 64bit.I am glad to have it.Thank you Amazon and Seller.

Subject: Had high expectations
Review: TP-Link is one of my go-to brands, and hence I had high expectations from this adapter. It works as intended, but only in specific ports in the CPU. Doesn't always stay stable, but does its work excellently otherwise. A satisfactory purchase.

Subject: Monitor mode is working | Don't think much you can go for it!
Review: Received Version 3, hopefully you'll get too.1. Range is not good but captures wi-fi network transmitting from distance of 40-50+ ft. ✌2. Kali-linux compatible (Search on Youtube for installation instruction)3. Monitor Mode is great. 😉4. Build quality is great! 👍5. Doesn't Heat much! 👍✔ To enable monitor mode:I followed the commands belowifconfig wlan0 downairmon-ng check killiwconfig wlan0 mode monitorifconfig wlan0 upiwconfig

Subject: PRODUCT IS COMMING WITH LEFT ANTINA DAMEZAD AND BROCKEN
Review: TODAY PRODUCT IS COMMING WITH LEFT ANTINA DAMEZAD AND BROCKEN AND SIGNAL ALSO NOT COMING TOTALLI IS NOT WORKING IAM ORDERED IN REPLACE OF NEW ONE IAM NOT SATISFIED PACIKING IS GOOD AND DELEVERED ALSO GOOD BUT ITEM IS DAMEGED NOT WORKING

Subject: wifi dongle for HONDA WRV
Review: Excellent product.  For emergency purpose we can use this dongle to browse internet. Actually I downloaded ES File explorer 4.0 version and installed in my Honda WRV DIGIPAD infotainment. Now I am able to watch movie while driving using ES movie Player.  But Please be very careful while driving.Many videos in youtube says by using Bluetooth tethering we can use internet in HONDA Digipad, but its not working in my car. So i bought this dongle.Delivery is excellent : just 12 hours my product delivered. I paid Rs 100 for delivery.

Subject: Not upto mark and worth the price I paid
Review: Though I was sitting in the same room where the wifi router is, the signal strength shown is just 20%. That too the signal gets disconnected. So, there is no question of moving to other rooms. The very purpose of purchasing is defeated.

Subject: Great if Laptop's Wi-Fi Driver Is Permanently Not Working
Review: My Wi-Fi driver has crashed beyond troubleshooting repair / installing again on my Lenovo laptop since few months. I have been resorting to ethernet cable but it is inconvenient to use if you like to travel around the house and work.I invested in TP-Link and well as the description says, it DOES link with the Wi-Fi router efficiently.Hits: Smooth connection. Economical also.Misses: The delivery. Takes quite some days to arrive.Overall, you should go for it, if your Wi-Fi driver has crashed beyond fixing.- SID

Subject: Linux users go for it...
Review: okay.. if i had to describe it in one word.. then it will be "unbelievable"coz i bought this to use in linux.. I'm using fedora 32 with latest kernel 5.7.. firstly i thought i will have to install drivers in order to make it work but guess what i plugged it in it started working out of the box.. even faster than windows 😍😍

Subject: Very good reception
Review: The Wi-Fi coverage is really good. Compared to the previous Wi-Fi setup with Belkin 300 router and laptop combo, this one betters in coverage and strength from a longer range. Tested installed on a desktop.At this age, the device could've been a plug-and-play type, although the driver installation is not so much hard. Easy setup, driver detects device quickly enough and works flawlessly. No connections drops yet, so far so good. Hotspot-ing from mobile phone.

Subject: Great product for desktop office home
Review: This is best one I used so far connectivity is great catches WiFi signal very good. I use this product for desktop daily 10-12 hours no issues no complaint s does the job

Subject: Not recommended for Windows 10 and VDSL 2+ Router.
Review: It was not compatible with VDSL 2+ router with high security. Speed is lower than the TP Link adopter I bought earlier which was longer in size with a green LED much faster and easier to install. It may work with older ADSL router with standard security and upto Windows 7.

Subject: Close to 1 Year Review: Good Product!
Review: It's a good product and serves the purpose for the given price.Signal Quality: 3/5 (poor(45%) signal if router is in a different room)Durability: 4/5Easy to Use: 5/5Value for Money: 3.5/5 (I bought it when prices were high, else it's 4/5)

Subject: For casual use only
Review: This wireless adapter is easy to install and easy to use. I could just plug in and the computer identifies this without any hassle. The wifi signal reception is ok, but the download speed is very slow compared to inbuilt wifi systems. This is cheap and easy solution and I recommend this for casual use.

Subject: Great product
Review: received the product yesterday. After months of suffering without proper internet, I finally found this and it does work superbly. The internet speed is good and is catching all wifi signals. The only problem I faced is that I had to download the drivers from the internet and then install in my laptop. The CD didnt work and neither did the automatic updates of the device worked and hence i am giving a 4 starI will post again if I feel the device stopped communicating wth the router.All seems good at the moment

Subject: The best usb wifi adaptor with no speed drop
Review: I have a Netgear n150 router installed in hall room and mostly I use wifi in my bedroom. Since my laptops internal wifi chip is damaged. I bought tp link wn822l model after a quick research and it works like charm, signal strength is always full and the best part is there is no speed drop.

Subject: Good
Review: Wifi signal good when near the router obviously decreases with distance and location of CPU or lappyHeats up a bit which makes it lose signal in my device atleastAutomatically detected in Windows 10 but install the driver given in CD or through their website

Subject: Refund requested
Review: Ordered this item to connect my PC with my Lenovo Mobile Hot spot. But  the TP Link Wireless USB connector, does not serve for the purpose. Hence I requested a refund. Not a replacement. So please don't send the same item. Please send a D-Link DWA-131 Wireless N Nano USB Adapter (Black) instead of TP Link adapter. I shall pay the additional amount. Otherwise please refund the cost i have already paid.

Subject: Good to go with it.
Review: Everything is fine with it but the cable it came with should be bit more longer and there must be something to be provided with this that can help sticking it with the pc so that it can stay safe as long as you won't move it.Technically, I must say that this is a great extender out there and you should surely go with this without any doubts. I am using this from last few months and i haven't found any single problem in connection or anything else.

Subject: Really disappointed with device performance
Review: I purchased this WiFi adapter but it didn't reach my expectations. This device performance is very low and continuously fluctuate WiFi reciver connection even after my router nearer to this device.Also I did not get any good internet speed with device . I'm using 60 MBps my internet plan but with this device hardly I'm getting 120 / 256 kB /s speed .

Subject: Expectations fulfilled
Review: Easy and convenient to install. The adapter has blinking led indicating that its working. WPS button helps to avoid the botheration of typing passwords. No buffering helps in viewing seamless HD video. Transfer speed adequate.

Subject: 100% combatible with Honda 'DigiPad'
Review: Very good product. Using with my Honda City-2018 Digipad, mainly for Navigation. I found in Q&A section that several people gave wrong information about the combatibility of this dongle with Honda Digipad. Please do not answer to any Questien if you are not cirtain about the correct answer. I recomment to all Honda Car owners to buy this product without any hesitation. Thanks.

Subject: Good and handy product
Review: Received it today, installed it with cd, and boom it was ready to use. initial the usb refused to get recognised but removed the usb and re fixed it on cpu it worked also cd when kept in the dvd writer it asked for auto run but  did not work so opened the cd folder and clicked it for auto run and it worked perfectly...as of now it is working smoothly, let us see for few days and see.

Subject: Not supporting for linux
Review: Guys v3 of this product is not supporting for linux.if ur looking only for kali linux monitor mode nd packet injection then plz dont buy this one nd youtubers also creating fake videos on this product that it will support monitor mode but the reality is,  it won't support monitor mode nd packet injection.

Subject: The product is perfect for its price tag
Review: Had to return the first one and yet writing a five star review, this is how much I am impressed with Amazon and their services.The product is perfect for its price tag. My WiFi router is on the first floor and my pc is on the ground floor of my house. When i use this in the front panel of the pc it works just fine. On the back panel it simply fails to work, i am suspecting some kind of interference. Internet speed, connectivity all work just fine. Went with this one because  Tplink seemed like a better choice than the unknown cheapo brands and i am satisfied with my decision.

Subject: Do not expect proper warranty service
Review: NO WARRANTY SERVICE. It stopped working after about 8 months. They do not have any diagnostic software. Their customer support asks you to try this try that. Then they refuse warranty service because the serial number was only on the box (which I did not keep).Finally the certified refurbished product they gave me as REPLACEMENT was also DEFECTIVE and fell apart.So I gave up on them.

Subject: Best in the Market
Review: One of the best receiver. Good signal strength and compatibility. No need to install any driver in Windows 10. And the range also pretty good. You will receive a very acceptable speed within the radius of around 20-25 meters even if its in the house

Subject: Overall good but supplied driver is horrible
Review: I bought this for my old windows 7 PCs for few day back. Appario delivered this very promptly.But the pathetic experience is installing driver by using supplied disc and from Tp link site also.They couldn't recognise the device. I thought that either my adapter was faulty or the usb port of my PC is defective. But after replacing the adapter from Appario (which also send very promptly)the problem remains. Then I took consultation from youtube install the driver anyway. But this is third party software.

Subject: WOW!!!
Review: I have good wifi connection with 30 mbps, but somehow I was not getting good signal to my desktop.I tried many options, but nothing worked. But this USB adapter has done a great job.This works with Linux. You can connect with RJ45 jack to your desktop.Great signal as if you are connected with LAN cable.

Subject: Super Waste of Money
Review: Super waste of money and time, please don't waste your hard-earned money and precious time.this works for maximum 9-10 days so that they CANNOT be returned and then they get defective and tada you cannot return. and thanks to super idiotic amazon service, they will help you by, just giving the manufacturers' AUTOMated irresponsive "too busy" customer care number or an similarly inefficient email id.Super waste of money and time, please don't waste your hard-earned money and precious time.

Subject: BEST REPLACEMENT TO YOUR BUILT IN NETWORK ADAPTER
Review: Guys if you pissed of from your built in network adapter then really you are at right place. I also have the same problem. i have a dell laptop.My pc sometimes don't show my wifi in the wifi list many times but at the same time it was showing in the other devices. I thought that may be it was because of my drivers. so tried all the possibilities i could that included installing ubuntu, debian, windows 8, windows 10. i tried everything even talking to the dell customer support, as my pc was out of the warranty so ultimately i had to do everything. But one just i find this and then it was like booommmmmmmmm.so if you had just pissed off from your in built network adapter then you can just try at once. hope you guys this will help you.

Subject: Easy to connect,easy to work on!
Review: Yes,the bestest adapter you can get at this price range. No doubt,no confusion. Just go for it. It works good on my Windows 7 PC,with  my mobile Mobile hotspot connectivity. It plays full HD videoes on youtube within a single click,no lagging,no buffering. Great product,great purchase.

Subject: Product is good to add conectivity but the range is very poor
Review: It can only be used if you are very close to the router i attached this to my room with one wall in between and the signal dropped constantly and it requires unplugging every time you boot your computer or it wont work. I would suggest to get model with antenna if you want to use with some distance from the router

Subject: Perfect solution for your internet problems
Review: I ordered the wireless network adapter when my laptop's connection router started failing me and it would just not work on any WiFi connection. Tired of finding LAN connection points, this small device helped me a great deal as the perfect solution to my internet problems on the go. Just plugged it in the system, installed the software and it was ready to be used! I have been using this system for just over month now. And so far, it has given me zero hassles.A must buy.

Subject: The adapter will not support channel 12 &13 in 2.4ghz
Review: Everything is good but this adapter is US version.. it will not support  channel 12 and 13 in 2.4ghz. If your router is broadcasting on these channels it will not be able to detect the signal.. And Tp link India should do something so that customer outside US  purchasing their products doesn't face any compatibility issues...

Subject: can not use as a wifi hotspot in pc
Review: I ordered the product to use in my PC for WiFi hotspot. To sharing my Ethernet connection to my phone.i checked the manual before buying and it is mentioned it can be used as a WiFi hotspot. i am really very disappointed with such a great name in market TP-LINK . i tried lot of ways , it just didn't work. So i suggest do not buy it for hotspot purpose, It can be used to connect to a wifi access point.Now i am using Binatone USB adapter, it is working very good.

Subject: Excellent product
Review: This is really awesome as I am having old laptop and while doing my office work there was frequent disturbance in connection but after using this TP-Link my laptop is getting 100% wifi signal.I strongly recommend to buy.

Subject: Speed is slow.
Review: Used it..speed is very weak and installation process is little bit long. This is not plug and play. First we have to install drive and software from dvd we get in box.Speed it very slow. Given 150mbps but as my friend told me his his 300mbps has only 10-20mbps of speed. So this is the lower version of it so we can expect same thing from that.

Subject: Lifeline for a dying machine
Review: My laptop is 6 years old and one by one things are stopped working on it. VGA port then DVD drive then one USB port. Recently wifi start disconnecting and as soon as I try to reconnect my machine freeze and eventually restart itself.  Being a programmer I tried several tricks in the book but nothing works.So before buying a new one I want to try one last thing and buy this device from Amazon. It's been more than 3 months and I am still working that same machine.(Other things are still dying one by one, but wifi is stable)

Subject: Good product with good price
Review: I had been facing issue with my wifi connectivity on my 10 years laptop . THIS PRODUCT SOLVED MY ISSUE AND HAPPY WITH It's  service.Wi-Fi issue gone.

Subject: Okay Adapter, supports only 2.4Ghz and maxes out at 30mbps.
Review: I have a 100mbps internet connection with both 2.4Ghz and 5Ghz WiFi access points.- This adapter supports only 2.4Ghz WiFi access points.- It maxed out at 25-30mbps.My phone was able to get 50-60mbps on the 2.4Ghz access point and 94mbps on the 5Ghz access point.It's a decent product if your internet speed is less than <40mbps or if you are looking for a cheap solution. This simply works.

Subject: Good product, durability issue
Review: While taking out from the usb port the cover once came out. I was scared thinking the product will be unusable. I fitted the cover back but it doesn't fits straight. I kept trying for a few times but I could not fit it straight, although there has been a no problem with receiving and functioning of internet. It's working fine like before.

Subject: Doesn't work with Linux version > 16.04
Review: If you are planning to buy it for using with your Linux system then be careful as it does not work with Linux distros like Ubuntu. It doesn't provide driver for Linux in the installation CD. It is available in the tp link download center but it doesn't support latest Linux Kernels like version > 5. There is no updated versions of the device driver available since 2018 for both Windows and Linux.P.S. It works fine with Windows.

Subject: Driver problem
Review: Very problematic RTWLUNA.Sys file error and BSOD crash all the time. Waste of money. Several users report same problem and TPLINK suggests to delete the file to solve the error. How can the solution be to delete an important system file?

Subject: It's doing it's job
Review: I bought a cheaper adaptor before, that couldn't be used for SHAREit. This one supports SHAREit ,but whenever I try to use internet from my phone's hotspot, the speed I get in my PC is half the speed of my phone. I can download only 1gb, even though 1.5gb data is totally consumed in my phone. This is really problematic.

Subject: Very good product, but bad seller experience
Review: Initially I ordered one unit. it was a defective product. Mostly the seller was trying to get rid of his old/damaged stock.The new unit works fine.The product as a whole works fine. These dealers make a mess in the middle

Subject: Excellent product
Review: I ordered this product with the hope to use this as a replacement for wired connection for desktop computer. Until now the product has come true to my expectations and has been working exceptionally well. I would recommend this product to anyone who would seek a good alternative to accessing internet on desktop computers along with laptop (as a replacement for built-in wi-fi device).

Subject: Best in the market
Review: I'm awestruck with this product!! Quite easy to install and my god it's fast. My friend suggested this wireless adapter and It has been one month since I'm using this product. To be honest I don't have any complain. I got it under 500 bucks and it's user friendly.What can you ask more?? I'll recommend this product any day.

Subject: Wireless Nano USB Wifi adapter
Review: Very nice product from Amazon. Very easy to use. Just put this adapter on the usb port of yout PC , thats it. Now u can use high speed Wifi thourgh this small device. I recommend to buy this product . Thanks.

Subject: Good product , gets the job done
Review: Nice product if you have a WiFi modem to connect to a few metres away . Won't give a coverage of 1km . But it gets the job done . If you want a coverage of greater than 10m , buy something better and more powerful ( better yet buy a 1kw wifi module and heat coffee while surfing the net . But I don't think they make that )

Subject: Happy after using!
Review: My expectations are fulfilled! Excellent wifi signal, and the ease of using are very much pleasing.I had one set back with delivery. The outer packing of "Amazon" had quite a large hole. The delivery boy came in the evening and somehow had hidden that from my view and left! Fortunately, the inside wrapper was intact. I give the whole event a benefit of doubt and wish to move on!I'm happy in the end with the product!

Subject: Doesn't support 5Ghz frequency.
Review: The product description is misleading. It says you can switch between 2.4 and 5Ghz WiFi frequencies. But it couldn't detect the 5Ghz connection on my HP laptop. The TP link website confirms the same.Now I am stuck with a useless device with no return and only replacement option.

Subject: Works without much trouble
Review: Used it for 3 months now. Just plug it into usb port and it works. Once or twice a month it seems to be not working, but simply pull it out and put it back into usb port and it works without any problem.

Subject: Perfectly priced and build
Review: A great product in all respects, the package itself has an additional plastic covering of its own, which is really suitable for such an epidamic, other than that, the product is as clean and as well build as it can be, besides that the product seems really underrated, since its priced preety low, its actually worth a lot more from my experience haha, tp-link is for sure the best provider out there, keep up the great work !!

Subject: Nice product
Review: WiFi signal⭐⭐⭐⭐Easy to install-⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐Easy to use-⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐This product is amazing. Very easy to use, just plug and play. It was very easy to install it's drivers, even I don't need to read it's installation guide.If my mobile is in my 2nd room it catches it wifi signal very easy. Very high range, with in 3 seconds it loaded YouTube home page in my laptop.Very happy with this product ☺️.

Subject: Recommended for long range of wifi...
Review: I connected this to my smartphones hotspot and it delivered me a fast range of network. Now I am enjoying it. I am using it from 1 month and I didn't face any problem. No need to worry about the cd installation. You can download it from tp-link website!

Subject: Working in Kali Linux monitor mode..!
Review: I bought this for kali Linux packet injection and monitor mode .And it is working perfectly .Check a youtube channel named techiesingh for the way to enable monitor mode in kali linux

Subject: Great product with minor drawbacks
Review: Nice product . Recived early . Easy to install and easy to use . But it's not compatible with Kali Linux for monitor mode and packet injection . You can't use it directly on Kali Linux as other compatible adaptor . But if you know Linux commond very well , then you can run few and make this adaptor compatible with Kali Linux ......Wifi signal is good . Feel is premium ....And cost saver too

Subject: V3 does support packet injection and monitor mode.
Review: I was hesitant to buy this at first because everyone said it wouldn't support packet injection and monitor mode on v3. But Techie Singh on YouTube put up a tutorial that shows you how to turn install it and turn on monitor mode on kali for v3. It supports injection mode by default. And yes I tried his 2 videos and now I'm a proud owner of a wireless adapter that support packet injection and monitor mode for such an affordable price and surprisingly good quality :)

Subject: Upgrade your dead Software with this small WIFi
Review: Excellent product and very easy to use. I had an old PC lying in store room which I recently started using. I was earlier using LAN connection for net. I am presently using a laptop which connects well to router. The old PC could not connect to router though I tried many methods. Therefore I ordered this product and it connected brilliantly. I have updated my software's in PC and WOW now it's as good as new!!  Thanks Amazon!!

Subject: Too hot to handle
Review: Not for heavy user like me. My Internet speed is 10mb/s. When I download large file i.e. above 1gb or big continuously it get really hot. And I think for that heat its keep getting disconnected. Not recommended for online gaming or live streaming for a longer period of time.

Subject: Adapter not working
Review: I need to change it. It's return window has been closed. It had CD and I had no CD socket in my laptop. so I took very long to install drives. When I install it is not able to find adapter

Subject: Unstable Performance
Review: In the beginning, it works fine albeit at a lower than expected speed. After 6 months or so it became really unstable. Sometimes unplugging and plugging in again helps but that can be irritating! Looking for a new adapter!

Subject: Excellent product
Review: Purchased my TP-Link TL-WN823N recently. Here's my honest review.Out of the box and you just plug to your spare USB port on the PC. Install the driver enclosed from the CD. Press the WPS button on your router and the TP link adapter to synchronise. And voila !!Works like a charm with blazingly fast speed. If you don't have WiFi on your PC, don't even have second thoughts. Just go for it.

Subject: Please write the version name  I  the product  description
Review: All over the it is good but I wanted the v1 but I recieved v3.Please can you write the version name in the product description  so that people who are looking for version  1  get the idea that is version  3 which doesn't support  packet injection and monitor mode  in kaki linux.

Subject: Installation wasn't user friendly....
Review: Couldn't install it to my windows 7 laptop with the driver cd supplied along with. The gadget just remained hidden and couldn't be traced no matter what until I checked into the company website and got a different (V2) version of driver. Now it's working fine.

Subject: It doesn't work with kali linux installed in virtual box on windows 10
Review: Don't go for it if u want to make it work with kali linux installed in virtual box in windows 10....else if u want to make it work normally then its ok but for kali linux it doesn't work i tried re-installing drivers too but still it didn't worked this is PERFECTLY HONEST review and also it doesn't have atheros chipset so don't go for it.

Subject: Works on Kubuntu and Mac OS
Review: I have been using this for the last 4 years (on *buntu Linux). It works perfectly. I just ordered another one. Their website is also just great for getting the drivers.Everything just works as you would expect. The brand has so far has served me very well. I hope they keep up the good work.

Subject: Plug and Play
Review: Plugged into Win10 PC. Works fine. Didnt need to install any drivers. Network speed slightly lower than what I get for my laptop in the same room. But I dont watch any streaming videos , so  I am fine. Some drag is seen in Video/audio conf calls.

Subject: Saved My 7000 bucks !
Review: So, like every other longtime windows user my Laptop too gave up its WiFi card. People just google it in your respective Laptop's website/forum and see that every other person is fed up because of this problem.I didn't wish to spend around 7k for new WiFi card and adapter and henceforth went for this and trust me , you won't regret.P.S. It does not support 5GHZ bandwidth so all of you willing to use it for having fun time with Jio Fibre and other high speed WiFi, shoo ! Don't have this.

Subject: Works great! No connection issues. Plug n Play.
Review: Took about 5 minutes to install the driver and boom. Worked like a charm. Been using it for 3 days now... No connection drop or anything. Works smoothly on my desktop. Great! Go for it! I went for the 300mbps high gain TP link model with dual antennas. Thank you Amazon!

Subject: Weak signal reception
Review: This product has no Support from customer care. Always getting network congestion message. Signal strength is very weak and works only if its close to Wifi Router. It doesnt even detect signal when we move it 30ft.

Subject: Unreliable
Review: This product works about 50 percent of the time. It appears to find networks with ease but the internet connectivity is inconsistent.

Subject: TP-Link Is Best
Review: I kept this as a spare in the unopened box for about six months and one day the USB wireless plugged into my computer just stopped working. With the CD that came with this I was back up and running in about 10 minutes. I have found that for years TP-Link has very good quality control and manufactures excellent tech gear.

Subject: Surely a 'Bestseller' item
Review: After using I can say it that it is really a 'bestseller' product.  I am using it in my laptop having windows  7. Very easy to install. Just use the CD after reading the manual. The installation process will take hardly 3-4 mins.It will catch the wifi signal automatically and the it  is having a very good capacity of catching the signal (it can catch the signal from G floor if the router is placed at 1st floor).

Subject: Does the job perfectly!
Review: Does exactly as advertised. Easy to install(plug n play), very portable, and most importantly wifi signal is really good. I have a 100mbps connection but since I am using an old laptop I was not getting proper speed (~20 mbps). This one gets me in the range of 90-110 mbps, so I am perfectly satisfied with this.

Subject: Range is good, but useless for pentesting
Review: If you are buying this for wireless network pentesting then don't buy it. This is TL-WN722N V2, which doesn't support monitoring mode (unless you go through very tedious process with right version of linux) so it is useless for packet injection.Seller hasn't mentioned about its version.However, its range is really good.

Subject: A really good wi-fi adapter
Review: I'm reviewing this after using a week..,Initially I was using a few unexpected WiFi adapter that was just ok! but after doing a little research I thought of getting TP-Link WiFi adapter and it is just acting like a charm. After using it, I noticed that I get internet speed more than my earlier adapter. Very good and strong signal connectivity.

Subject: Difficult to Install on Win 7
Review: The CD that came along would not detect the adaptor no matter what you did safe mode, anti virus disabled no goFinally got to work.Speed is optimum if the mobile is close to the adaptor to share internetHowever not as fast as the USB cable connection

Subject: Excellent
Review: Works out of the box for Linux (Fedora 22+). This was my biggest requirement and my biggest fear since different variants of the same product use different chipsets which could end up not working with the kernel drivers. But I didn't have to do anything. Just set up the Wi-fi configuration itself. Range has not been an issue even though the wi-fi router is situated in a different room.

Subject: My router is located in the next room and i get excellent signal strength
Review: After 6 months of continuous usage i could vouch for this product.I use this on my PC. My router is located in the next room and i get excellent signal strength. No drop in signal. Always better to buy a trusted reliable brand than a brand new brand.

Subject: High Gain at Long Range
Review: This adapter is really good at receiving signals from a considerably long range. You can skip repeaters if you buy one of these for your laptop or desktop devices to be used in other rooms. Be wary of physical obstacles like walls and doors. Signal reception may be affected because of that.

Subject: WiFi  USB Adaptor
Review: I have ordered this product for my CCTV. But it did not connected to my camera, I replaced again but result was same. So I ordered upgraded version of this which supports 300 MBPS. It got connected automatically in first try. Will not recommended to anybody, just spent so e more money and go for TP-Link TN-WN823N model.

Subject: Not upto the highest speed
Review: My TP-Link dongle is within 5 meters range from my WIFI router.It doesn't give good download speed on PC, I need to keep removing and plugging it back in, even though having over 70% strength.Otherwise it is easy to use, I had to install the software using the provided CD on my PC.

Subject: Top Quality external usb wifi adapter
Review: My laptop internal wifi adapter developed fault. I got a deal and purchased this tplink external usb wifi adapter. It is working well. It is an plug n play usb wifi adapter in windows 10. For advanced operation you may need to install the software form the given cd.It can connect to internet if you have an existing wifi internet. Or it can share you computer's internet connection through wifi.Just go for it if you need usb wifi adapter.

Subject: Working Efficiently
Review: Router is installed on Ground Floor and I'm using THE Adapter on 2 Floor. Before using this product the signal was only 1 bar filled for a few seconds and frequent disconnection for Atheros AR9485WB Wireless adapter in my Laptop. But now I'm getting 3 or 4 bars on 2 Floor with consistency. It has really worked for me.

Subject: Save yourself the hassle and buy Archer T3U instead
Review: Don’t buy this if you need a 5GHz band because this offers only 2.4Ghz. I had to order the Archer T3U which offers both and my first reaction is Wow! Getting max speed as per broadband plan in one corner of my house.

Subject: The best solution to your weak Wifi signals problem
Review: This is exactly what I needed for my laptop full Wifi signals in every corner of all rooms.After last windows update my Wifi signals were not consistent... Regular interruptions in signal and a lot of time was wasted on finding solutions on Google, Windows and youtube... Which was nothing but waste of time.This product is amazing... Small... Easy to install... Easy to use... The best solution to my Wifi signals problem....

Subject: just one word!! L.E.G.I.T
Review: just go for it!the wide range thingy going on is amazing!!yea so last month i asked my neighbor for the wifi password he refused, but he realised i wont get the range so he decided to give me the password (also i shamefully asked him for the password like atleast 6 times soo yea!)and lil did he know that i had this beast wifi adapter thingy installed!! DUDE mind freking blown the range is out of the world (pun intended), *few months later , yea the guy shifted his house, probably bcos i drained his wifi!! poor soul hallelurr!!. so any way just go for it!!its amazing!yours trulyFELLOW EARTHLINGS

Subject: Only windows support from tp link plz read the full review for linux and mac
Review: This product only works with windows .If you want to use it for linux then you can use Ubuntu 16.04 LTS .This is the only Linux distribution that I was able to connect to WiFi using this WiFi adapter .By the way don't buy if you want to use it with linux or Mac .Also don't buy it because it has only monitor mode .It does not support packet injection.Pentesters don't buy this product

Subject: Awesome
Review: Excellent product. Highly recommended. Easy to use and install. Recommended to use incase ur wifi of laptop or system is non functional. Its better to use this product rather than investing money behind ur computer service.

Subject: Windows don't recognise this device
Review: When u plug into your pc your windows started crashing. You can't use this usb deviceBcz of new windows updates.. don't waste your money. Just use wifi extender or direct ethernet wire

Subject: Good product --- works exactly as stated in the manual ...
Review: Good product --- works exactly as stated in the manual (need to be a little technical if you want to install additional features). External antenna based products are always better than products that come with built-in internal antenna. (You can get other WiFi Adapters with internal antenna)Best part of this product is that you can attach an external WiFi Antenna if you are not satisfied with the Antenna which is fitted on this product.Recommend - For purchase and good value for money

Subject: Simply the best! It is Extremely small
Review: Simply the best! It is Extremely small, well designed with good build quality.Its plug and play with any computer and any OS.It works out of the box with newer versions of Linux distros and Raspbian OS for the Raspberry Pi.Have been using it for my Raspberry Pi Zero for a couple of years now.Works flawlessly.

Subject: Don't buy for monitor mode
Review: I am replaced this products in 2 days , because i am buy this item for Ethecal hacking and monitor mode but he doesn't support,are you buy for normal Wi-Fi use is working ok,Monitor mode is supporting in us version,  this products is indian model.

Subject: Hell No Worst nano usb poor wifi strength and forget the damn speed
Review: It's absolute fake nothing is true about this nano USB I got 50mbps plan before now I upgraded it to 100mbps still the same if you even stay right infornt of the router you will have 70mbps max  if you use a laptop in bedroom gone case check the above results I have shared since last week worst product guys don't buy I'm returning it waste of money your phone hotspot will give you atleast 20-30mbps I'm disappointed

Subject: Using tplink for 7 years now... working as expected
Review: This is what I just needed. it works like a charm. Took me less than 30 seconds to open it and plug it. It is just plug and play. The provided cd is of no use. It says 150 Mbps but I could not test that but works just fine in 100 Mbps connection.

Subject: Very strong signals, doesn't auto disconnect
Review: The quality is good, has good speed and doesn't disconnect like other cheap wifi.

Subject: Worst after sales service and faulty device
Review: I bought it on 2 August 2020 and writing review on 10 September 2020 this is the worst purchase it stopped working after a month and don't fall for 3 year warranty and is a scam . I talked with there team for replacement I got to know I have to post this to there Mumbai headquarters and bear the charges to mail this myself and after all this there is no guarantee that it will be replaced it can also be rejected

Subject: Good - 60% signal strength at 10m with full speed
Review: The setup is fantastic especially the WPS option in the wireless configuration utility which enables you to connect even without knowing the security info of the wireless router and extracts all the info for you. My unit is working great with full internet speed at 10m from the router and about 55-60% signal strength.

Subject: A good and durable product for Windows 10
Review: Been using for over 8 months now for my Windows 10 PC. The device works perfectly fine till now. No issues with connectivity, easy to install and use. The only disadvantage with the design (which can be overlooked in my opinion) is when you try to remove it from a USB port which is tight. In such a case, the device has to be removed delicately else the outer cover becomes loose and unreliable for safe removal.

Subject: Its very helpful and solves your purpose
Review: I liked the product very much as after a long time my laptop could catch wifi signal from the other rooms of my home. It is easy to install and easy to handle . The 3 year warranty period is not even given by computer or laptops :) .One thing you have to keep in mind that its very small so you have to keep an eye on it :)

Subject: A good and trusted product at a low price
Review: Range is good compared to those unbranded (local) one. Easy to place little away from pc because of cable. I have encountered problems in installation of driver, everytime it says could not find device, it may be some other problem in my pc. After this I have installed realtek wlan usb driver then I recieved the signal and everything goes well till now. The Intensity of the signal is quite high than I expected because my router is in the ground floor and I am using this device at second floor. I think it is better to go with this device rather than investing more money for wifi repeater booster. Case may vary according to situation.

Subject: Fastest setup i have ever done
Review: Best product to useMy hp laptop's wifi adapter had problemSo i bought this to use wifiAnd this is fastest installation i have ever doneAlready using itNo difference in speedNo fluctuationEvery thing looks good at this point day first.Go for it

Subject: Product quality is good but only supports upto Windows 7 ONLY.
Review: The product works great but only supports Windows 7 and older versions.This product has NO DRIVERS available for Windows 8 or newer OS, not even on their website.Windows 8 / 8.1 / 10 does not recognize the device.

Subject: Satisfactory product
Review: Good product as described.Properly seeled pack.Product has Wi fi device driver CD and usser manual.Easy to install and use.Built quality is good feel like premium.Good material used.Overall great experience.

Subject: Good Product
Review: Very good product. Good delivery by amazon. If you want to use it in XP then you have to download TP-LINK Wireless Configuration Utility tool from TP Link website. Otherwise you can not use it in XP properly. The tool is not supplied with the CD. Only driver is there. If you want to use it in Win 7 - 10 then there will be no problem, only driver is sufficient.

Subject: Review after 1 month of usage.
Review: Nice product. Used it with my laptop, to fix network issues since the network adapter in my laptop was damaged and this worked perfectly fine. Catches wifi signal in the best way and takes hardly few minutes to setup. I'm using ubuntu and therefore I didn't have to install the driver or anything. Just plug and play. I'm case of windows system, you need to install the driver from the CD provided or you can download from their website. This product is amazing!

Subject: Connect your desktop with Wi-Fi easy and fast
Review: this product is very easy to install with the help of CD the CD comes with the package it provides a very good speed a must buy product you want to connect your desktop with Wi-Fi

Subject: WiFi dongle for Mac
Review: I was doubtful while purchasing this product but was surprised that it worked like a charm on my Mac. Worth the purchase.Was easy to install and use. Only issue is that some of Mac’s inbuilt software’s don’t recognise the WiFi dongle. Otherwise it works as required

Subject: very bad download and upload speeds very inconsistent pings size is ...
Review: I bought this hoping it would be an upgrade over my existing WiFi adapter, the speed and range is way below expectations. i have a 150 MBps internet connection and i manage to get maximum of only 8.96 MBps download and 800 KBps upload speeds with very inconsistent pings.Pros:works out of the box with Ubuntu 18.04 LTSCons:very bad download and upload speedsvery inconsistent pingssize is bigger than other faster WiFi Adapters.There are better ones out there for cheap. I've gone back to using my Digisol WiFi adapter which is Designed and manufactured in India.

Subject: Not compatible with linux
Review: The  model sold is TL-WN823N _V2 and it does not have Linux drivers. Though it is mentioned as Linux supported it does not have any drivers on CD or on their website. Returning the product. If you are planning to use it for Linux, don't buy it.

Subject: Technically Good product
Review: Product received in time . Quality as good as mentioned. Very easy to install . Moreover  wifi signal strength  is very good . I am happy with quality of product. Using this product from last one month with my desktop no complaint so far.

Subject: Now Desktops can connect to Hotspots
Review: Theri mass value for money. Able to connect desktop to a hotspot "God bless TPLINK"

Subject: Go for plug and play as this has too many hassles
Review: After two months of Intermittent struggles with drivers, incompatibility, usb not identified errors I finally had to ditch it. While it worked, it worked fine but then it kept not working too many times to make this Work From Home a hassle I didn’t need. Sorry TP-Link, I wanted to like this little device, but it simply didn’t work out.

Subject: One of the best
Review: The signal gain is really good and serve your purpose as I struggled to get good reception earlier, tried couple of odd options in range of 200-400 bucks but of no use. TP N300 works seemlessly even with low signal strength

Subject: Nice product.. Really sturdy and reliable
Review: Very easy installation.. No issues with connectivity.. No tech support required.. Product has worked very well without any issues so far.. Using it from ground floor to 2nd.. Router on 2nd floor.. But connectivity is still awesome..

Subject: Stopped working in 3 months - No way to get your product serviced.
Review: The product stopped working in 3 months. Very disappointed with the purchase.It is supposed to have 3 years warranty. But there is no way to avail this warranty.TP-Liink Toll Free number does not work.When you email them they don't respond.

Subject: Bad services of sailer.
Review: Though the product ''wifi adapter'' is good but as I have not found  3 feet usb extension cable mentioned in the  description of the order even replacement of the product . So I would say u should take consider of customer's complaint. I mailed to the Amazon customer support department but the did'nt response to that. So I would say work on ur customer service depart  and if possible give away my 3 feet uSB extension  cable mentioned in the product description.

Subject: Fantabulous....Must buy
Review: Got timely delivery....nice packing....product is easy to install. Download drivers fron website. Package contains CD, but now a days CD drive are no more in laptop and desktop.The adoper is fantastic and able to get speedy internet access to my desktop.Going to buy another one very soon

Subject: Best for Normal use but not for ET.
Review: This is by far the best wireless adapter for the price. Though,I have initiated a return as it didnt serve my needs. It works with kali linux, just works. But you cannot use it for monitor mode and packet injection as it is not V1. I looked at the serial number and it was V3. You cannot even change the MAC Address on this one.The V1 has the chipset Atheros but this one has Realtek I think. There is a major difference. The V1 is not available in Delhi right now as its just outdated. but the adapter works fine.Cheers and Merry Christmas.

Subject: TP-Link TL-WN725N  Include the latest drivers on the CD in future.
Review: The latest drivers for TP-Link TL-WN725N to support  windows 10 had to be downloaded. Otherwise, the device is working perfectly well. The manufacturer has to include the latest drivers in the CD in future.

Subject: Best accessory for wifi as compared to PCI equivalent.
Review: One of the best product from TP Link that I am using right now. Choose it without any second through.And please note it is latest version product, i.e., V3. (TP Link may update it in future)Drivers are readily available on the website.Good signal reception and perfect build quality and finish.It's TP Link, no need to think twice. Just go for it. Brand says it all.

Subject: Best wifi onnector/ dongle
Review: I have 100mbps wifi at home and this connector works perfectly for my work/ personal computer. Its plug and play for systems running on windows 10 OS with all the drivers.We also get a CD in the box if the PC does not have any drivers. Pulls around 70mbps download speed with minimum ping. Good enough for a home PC.

Subject: Don't buy.
Review: Keeps on disconnecting on it's own, but won't connect back. Big headache, especially when we are doing some important work. Please dont buy. Total nuisance.

Subject: PLUG AND PLAY
Review: Good Product Using It With 10 Meters Of Range With 40 Mpbs Actfiber Net (I'm Getting 35 Mbps With This Device)Note - Install It In Front Side Of CPUFor Best Results Make Sure There Are No Obstacles Around The Wifi Receiver

Subject: Worked like a charp. Super product.
Review: As expected worked like a charm. My laptop had worst wifi reception. Thought to give it a try, and to my great surprise where it was difficult getting a single signal its showing 100% wifi signal strength. Strongly recommend this product.

Subject: Signal lost, hanging problem plz do not buy
Review: HI all, i read all reviews of this WIFI TP link dongle WN821 and purchased. but this had hanging problem, signal lost problem, and speed fluctuates and (suppose 3 person is using home router wifi, if no one is connected with that wifi router now and then when i connected speed was ok and it had signal lost problem also,. but when other person got connected then my TP link router net speed in laptop was zero and hanged and lost signal. this is not good . ) please do not buy. but yes AMAZON experience is best and person from customer care experience was best . he immidately helped me with return of this and refund. amazon plz continue ur such positive response from your customer care behaviour.

Subject: Getting (Not to far...or... Not to near) range...
Review: An average product and budget adapter for hackers who are beginning. It supports kali Linux 2020 have installed it. WiFi signal is not that good was getting around limited range of signals.Otherwise it's is easy to use and install has an installation CD drive.And this comes with OTG cable..

Subject: Be Careful.
Review: The wi-fi adpater does not require installation. It works out of the box.But there are two issues i am facing. Hence it is idle now.It might probably be a problem with the device given to me.1. the Wi-fi does not connect. It detects the network. But it does not connect.2. Before the first issue came up, the speeds kept on varying. Sometimes it will be too slow and sometimes it will be normal speed.

Subject: Very handy and useful
Review: Handy Dongle for those whose laptop WiFi chip is not functioning properly for whatever reason. This dongle catches the WiFi signal from the nearby router. Set up is very easy.

Subject: TW-TN722N V3
Review: The one I got from here is V3, and it's a delight for ethical hackers. But you have to adjust some settings and it's good to go. It perfectly supports monitor mode and packet injection if you are thinking of buying it go for it perfect in it's price range.

Subject: Range of this TP-Link TL-WN725N 150Mbps Wireless N Nano USB Adapter is very bad
Review: Well this is not my first time purchasing  / Using this product. However this now the range is soooo poooor. that it is not picking wifi signal of my wifi router which is in my house. in fact it is not picking up any wifi signals in the range which are visible in my phone or lanptop. This is picking up only signals only few meters or should i say maybe below 10 mtrs radius. THIS IS THE VERY WORST PRODUCT I PURCHASED SO FAR ON AMAZON.

Subject: V2.0 doesn't support in Kali Linux
Review: Hey Guys let me try to give some honest review.Reason why purchased it?I wanted to test monitoring mode for wireless hacking, as ALFA adapters are of quite high range this was the best in price.Cons :1. The latest version i.e. version 2.0 uses realtek drivers which doesn't work on Kali Linux 2017/2016 as tested2. So you should think before you buy this, mostly you will get v2.0 only as v1.0 is getting obsoletePros:1. Amazing speed. 4dBi is awesome. I tried to test the signal strength and it worked like charm2. Quite light weight, plug and play deviceMy take :Had to return the product as the device drivers doesn't support in Kali linux.

Subject: Great performance
Review: I purchased ball ibaton, digisol, D-link and TP-link wifi adapters. D link is work great but you need to install drivers when you change device but to link is portable no need to install drivers on windows 10, iball ibaton is worst and digisol is not bad , Finally I recommend d link or tp link

Subject: Small, Handy works as expected
Review: My Desktop motherboard wifi was having some problem, so purchased this and it working with very good signal strength.After driver installation signal strength was more. Thanks for the fantastic product.

Subject: For LINUX it DOES NOT support
Review: I got carried away by several reviews and purchased this for my Ubuntu 16.04 OS. However, after medling with it for two days, I got a confirmation from the customer support of TP Link that this adapter does not support Linux OSs.
