But skeptically, even the package box of this adapter says it works on Linux. Maybe it does not support Ubuntu and may support other OSs. So, I have no reviews about performance as I have not used it at all. I returned as is.

Subject: Be careful and read the fine print
Review: The product is advertised as 150Mbps promoting users to presume that it support 5GHz band, whereas it doesn't. It mentioned in the specs that it supports only 2.4GHz, but that's not obvious on first look. So buyers be careful.

Subject: Excellant product
Review: This is a good product. My laptop's wifi board got damaged and its very expensive to replace it.I was searching for an option to use the net at my office and finally got this one. This product is sleek and stylish. There is a green indicator which tells that the product is working. Just plug and forget it. You dont need to disconnect it every time before you put the lap inside the bag because the adapter is so small. Its not a hindrance to other pendrives being connected to the adjacent usb ports. Affordable price. 3 years warranty also available.

Subject: Must Buy
Review: Best oneWill recommend to alldoes what it is built for...i get great speed with this upto 106mbpsim using ACT...but ya its pretty cheap and must have if ur into pc gaming and stuffbut also a good option for normal useas its a Bang For Budget!!!Go for itim using it for 2 years now n no probsand ya thank you amazon

Subject: Connected without cd....
Review: Nice product. In my system. I don't have cd drive. I am worried about that.How to install how to configure it !!!!But fortunately i just plug the adapter and it automatically connects starts showing wifi signal.I think the software it may be pre installed in my system.Hence no need of cd. I am happy with the productEasy to install 🤩🤩🤩

Subject: Good product
Review: For using on Linux we need to make the driver not plug and play - but if you are using linux definitely u are aware of teminal commands, help content are very extensive so no need to go on Google just navigate to tplink site and download drive and follow the instructions.Signal strength is good just started using it , till now it's good

Subject: Simple and excellent to use
Review: Nice and small works as advertised. Was simple plug and play. But if you download utility from website of tplink it can be used for more than just connecting to networks.used it for file transfers via Xender with my computer 40-50 Mbps(mega bits per sec) is normal transfer speed. No drops whatsoever. Steady and reliable connection

Subject: A must have item
Review: If you've PC and you use Ethernet probably you won't think of this device. But trust me it's very useful. Ethernet port stopped for my PC so I bought this and the issue was resolved. You can go for it rather than changing the board.

Subject: Monitor Mode and Packet Injection Working in v3.
Review: This is Version 3.Monitor mode and packet injection  is working perfectly fine.U just need to install some custom drivers.And monitor mode and packet injection will be enabled.I've attached some  pictures for proof.

Subject: Nice product good build quality and can be used for wifi hacking
Review: It is a good product but we have to install the driver if you are using it for kali or parrot OS .The best part is the chipset used in this product is different but for hacking we need atheros ar9721 but this adapter uses tp-link chipset but don't worry we can do DOS attack on wifi and capture Handshake and do a lot with this.

Subject: Looks good but is useless
Review: I ordered this product wishing that I don't in need external CD player I have a gaming pc so I don't have a CD player or external CD player I was hoping that it would work without one but very was disappointed....

Subject: Good product with no heating issues
Review: Have been using it for 3 months now. You know of a product's performance when it's so undemanding that you forget about it for days and it's functioning smoothly. Same is here. In this WFH time, it's always there in my system and i hardly take it out. I picked up this one because other ones had heating issues and it's upto the expectation.

Subject: Useful product for old pc
Review: Very nice product. we can access internet in pc through mobile hotspot also. I was not sure whether local brands would work fine or not do got wifi adapter from a good brand tp link & it works 100% fine.u just need to install software through the cd provided and just plug and play.

Subject: Only technical support is poor.. but product works well
Review: The toll free number is not attended till now... Where i needed to register my product for 3 years of warranty.Product works well though.. with my Windows XP.

Subject: Not happy with product
Review: Does not support 5gh band, not sure how 300 mbps will be achieved. It is going upto 40 mbps. I want to exchange and want another model which support 5gh, bit there is no option to return or exchange with other model.

Subject: Truely compatible with Linux
Review: It is plug and play for most of the OS including modern main stream linux like Ubuntu or Linux Mint.

Subject: Good product and works well
Review: Works well as intended. Need to load the driver to th PC which is included in the cd. The PC then becomes WiFi enabled. No more network cables required. I bought asecond one after seeing good performance of first one.

Subject: Best WiFi usb
Review: It is one the best usb WiFi you can buy, but always check for discount, as this can go as low as ₹400, never had any hardware issue and no connectivity issue, WiFi range is good, make sure you put it in usb 2.0 or 3.0 not in legacy usb 1.1, if you do so you will not get good speed

Subject: Handy experience to have a wifi connector
Review: Very easy to set up and connect to Home WiFi with ease. Haven’t check excited range as I have set up my computer almost a meter away from router.

Subject: Does not support monitor mode and packet injection..
Review: This product is version 3.0 hence who are buy for penetration testing i.e. it does not support monitor mode and packet injection.... It has realtek chipset not the superior atheros chipset

Subject: Just Plug and Play
Review: The device is working perfectly for me. Those who have issues with laptop wifi adapter or want to connect their desktop computer to the Internet, It's a perfect gadget for you.Though it seems to be a little expensive, it's worth the price.Reasons to buy:1. It comes with an antenna.2. It looks ultra-stylish.3. It definitely gives you more speed.4. 3 years warranty.5. It connects rapidly as you plug it in.

Subject: Close your eyes and just buy it! It's a Tp-Link Product
Review: I brought it for 669rs, it is really worth it paying that. The best Product in Best Price. Wifi Range is extremely good! You can also use this adapter for your BluRay Home Theater or Your Digital Setup box. And yeah 300Mbps means 300Mbps no fraud in that.D-link adapter price in 699rs or 799rs but PLEASE DON'T BUY THAT! This one is the best!NO DRAWBACKS FROM MY SIDE!

Subject: Very easy to use and smooth running
Review: Best quality wifi signalVery easy to use just need to plug in Nd connectVery much tech support n worthy.Just go for it .eyes closed....

Subject: Does it's job!!
Review: It's so simple. Just plug in to usb and install driver with provided CD... Job done.Far far better than the local cheaper and useless USB adapters.

Subject: Poor poor quality
Review: This product is most third grade choice if you want to use with macbook. It doesnt work on mac OS Mojave or later versions..just crappy and outdated.what a waste of money!!

Subject: Excellent functionality and ease of use.
Review: I suffered rain damage on many ports on my ASUS laptop and lost the wifi functionality on the board.  My only option to connect to the net was to use a wifi USB adapter and this product filled that requirement admirably.  Have had no problems using this adapter.  The glowing indicator on it is a good indication of the wifi working as well.The adapter is quite tiny and doesn't project much outside the laptop and so it is easy to carry it in the bag without any problem.  Highly recommended.

Subject: Good compatible but heating problem is there
Review: Compatible and easy to use, just plug and play device in desktop (windows 10, other os no idea) but it's getting heated while continuous use and don't know whether it can be used for such. along time. So just kept for emergency usage

Subject: Good for the price
Review: Actually for this piece I would expect something slightly better(there r alot of options other for much cheaper but not as big brand as tp link). It is really small (nano size) and catches range quite well. I can get range of 4 bars sitting in my closed room about 5 meters away from the router kept outside.As an added advantage u even get a green light in it indicating that the drivers r installed and it is working.

Subject: Easy to use.
Review: Easy to use.If 3g speed is enough for your needs ,you can buy this product.As this product doesn’t support 4g speed.works good on any devices both Mac and windows systems.Product comes with a cd.cd should run in the respective system to use the services of the product.

Subject: My Wifi Mate
Review: Excellent wifi receptor,good signal range,crosses two walls easily,non disconnecting adaptor,look good,using from last purchase date no issues at all.one can buy blindly...

Subject: Good price + seamless experience. (Should also have 5GHz band)
Review: Its a great product at this price.Works great with good connectivity.It should also have 5Ghz band to connect to dual band routersDocumentation should clearly mention the path to download software from support page. Most new PCs and Laptops do not have CD/DVD Drives.

Subject: Good signal strength Plug-n-Play
Review: Good signal strength tum 10 meters. Easy to use - plug and play. Didn't have to use CD for installation. Yet to evaluate it's speed at 300 mbps as my broadband is up to 100 Mbps. A bit expensive in comparison to other products available.

Subject: Its working great
Review: I already had a realtek wifi adapter which i was using in my desktop, but the adapter was not at all working smooth, there was no stable wifi signal and when i am trying to play videos on my desktop, it was stucking my computer, signal going off and on.This product is working very smoothly, no issues what so ever.

Subject: Amazing compact Wifi Adapter for PC
Review: I am writing this review after about 1.5yrs of usage.First look, it's so tiny and fits tight in the usb slot and just about 3mm bulging out.Best WiFi device for PC inspite of being expensive than other products, the lifetime is appreciable and serves it's purpose wonderfully.Easy installation and no mess.Connects easily everytime.Bought for ₹800.

Subject: Best WIFI Dongle for the desktop.
Review: Its TP-Link, so no need of explanation. the drivers are available on their site & CD included in the pack. the wifi-hotspot feature is there. as per the package description, it'll give you 3 year warranty, so better to keep the bill.*****:-)

Subject: Go for it!!!
Review: Do no spend 2k+ in repairing your network card. Just buy this and solve all your problems.Pros:Connects very easily and quickly .Handy.Full internet speed if it's upto 150 mbps.Cons :It's lil slow if its far away from your WiFi router.

Subject: it works nice for me
Review: Plug and play with WIN 10 and  works nice for me for my internal home use. When you plugin to USB port it will be having a projection of 2 centimeter ,so need to handle you laptop for that side. If you have a back slot for USB then no issue.

Subject: Great product
Review: 1. easy to install.2. automatically get connected with Router.3. speed is good.4. signal receiving capacity is excellent.5. and the most important... it works with WINDOWS 10

Subject: Not working.
Review: It couldn't connect to WiFi after installation.2 weeks passed in trial and I couldn't return it for exchange.There is no customer care center in our city either. I don't know what to do with this useless product.

Subject: Worked seamlessly with my Raspberry Pi 2 - MODB - ...
Review: Worked seamlessly with my Raspberry Pi 2 - MODB - 1GB - Quad core.The receiver is really tiny, comparable to the Logitec unifying receiver that I have.This one is only 2.4Ghz. So it wont connect to a 5Ghz network if you have one. I did not notice that, but it does not matter and serves the purpose.

Subject: If anyone is looking to buy Cheapest (probably) WIFI usb dongle for Hackintosh. This is it.
Review: I recently installed hackintosh on my Ryzen 3600 build and the only thing that didn't work was onboard WI-FI. Pop this puppy in and it's good to go.I get constantly amazing speeds and range is much much better now.I did need to install drivers for mac OS. But then it all worked like charm.

Subject: Very good and easy to set up. Works perfectly.
Review: Update after about 60 days daily use :No signal drops. 2 to 3 bars connectivity maintained at 18 feet distance through one wall. Highly recommended.Excellent connectivity and speed. Easy set up. No issues whatsoever. Just gets heated a bit but that i guess is normal.

Subject: Enable Wifi on  CP Plus DVR using this
Review: If you want to enable Wifi on your CCTV recorder from CP Plus... then this is the product you must buy.  Just plug the device and you get Wifi connectivity after completing necessary configuration on DVR.  No additional software needed

Subject: Very Poor range..Frequent disconnects
Review: Even when the router is in line of sight less than 10 m away, this supposedly 'High Gain' adapter is still not able to pick signals and maintain a stable connection. Pathetic piece of hardware, and the supporting drivers are not available for Windows 10. Buy at your own risk.

Subject: Very good
Review: Very good product. I bought it twice.With an old computer the wifi software slows down the system. So I uninstalled the software and only installed the driver. Then it is working fine. And with the new computer which has windows 7, there's no issue.

Subject: Solved my WiFi to PC distance problem
Review: Liked it a lot... My WiFi is in my hall and it was hard for other adapters to keep up with the distance... That's why I bought this WiFi adapter with high range receiver and solved my problem... Also its fast and good enough for online gaming

Subject: Go for it if your wifi is setup at 2.4 Ghz
Review: Everything is good. Just Plug and Play (Tested for Windows 10) Only one things is missing is that it only supports 2.4 Ghz Bandwidth and Not 5 Ghz Bandwidth.No speed issues.No connectivity drop. TP link is my favourite brand for Networking equipments

Subject: Excellent product !! Real plug n play
Review: Excellent product !! Real plug n play , no need for CD software installation. It is quite easy to use, just plug in and your PC shows the available wifi connections !!

Subject: It's supports monitor mode and packet injection but first you need to install it's driver.
Review: It supports with Kali Linux but before plugging in first you need to install it's driver for Linux you can download from its official site .

Subject: A worthful product
Review: I was having a problem with always connecting my jiofi to pc using a usb cable and to prevent the  jiofi from bursting by charging the battery , I had to remove the battery when I am connecting it . But when this adapter came it was so easy for me to connect to jiofi . And even we can set a hotspot in your pc (computer) with this . Very satisfied 😉😊😁.

Subject: Product is good & worthy, router should be at distance of less than 6-7 meters for connectivity
Review: Product quality is good as per the band, however if the router is more than 6-7 meters distance we will not be able to connect to Wifi to the desktop or it keeps disconnecting frequently. Easy to deploy the device, just have to install software by the CD received and connect the USB wireless to the computer.

Subject: Pricey, but the best device in this category.
Review: I bought this for my desktop, as my router stays in a different room.Setting up the adapter was easy.. Plug it in, install the Wizard from the tiny disk.. And you are ready to connect.. As it supports WPS setup, getting it connected to the router is straight forward. Stays connected and speed has been good so far.1. easy to install.2. automatically get connected with Router.3. speed is good.4. signal receiving capacity is excellent.5. very small in size

Subject: Superb Wifi Adapter.
Review: Very good Speed of the adapter. TP-Link is famous for making quality networking Devices for years now and I bought this Adapter for the same reason. I am Totally satisfied with the product and Its very small adapter with Green LED in it.

Subject: ***Highly recomended ***
Review: Thanks to TP Link for providing such type op item in era of windows 10 OS....It put life in my windows 7 32 bit desktop...reveiewing after 4months,,,not a single issue found till now..If you are using windows 7 then this is for you..

Subject: Most needed for any PC
Review: Works perfect on windows 10. Plug and play! Worth every penny. Good quality product and will recommend to anyone who needs a wifi adapter for their pc !

Subject: So far working as it should be
Review: I was using a wayona WiFi adaptor previously but apart from having very poor coverage due to internal antenna it also have some issues of loosing connection sometimes so I bought this TP link WiFi adaptor and so far it greatly improved my data connection speed and coverage. As per my initial experience I would recommend this to potential buyers.

Subject: Very bad product. It's spoiling my laptop.
Review: Its been around 10 months I bought its working fine without any interrupt.But After 4 months USB port which I'm using Tp-Link stopped working.After 9 months second USB port also stopped working.Don't know whats happening, every 4 moths around the port which is used by TP-Link was not working.Earlier I have given 5 star for non interrupted functioning but not very upset with this.

Subject: Durable Nanotechnology Wireless adapter 5 star
Review: This is best nanotechnology thing I have seen in my life it works perfect and fine#no rust #flawless goldplated usb sides.... Best in market you're money paid is valued here... Customer Service is also very lovely I was unable to install as my pc was window 7 very automatically... But customer care TP-LINK HELPED me out in very lovely way thank you Amazon and TP link😘

Subject: Problem with softAP, doesn't work.
Review: No matter how many times I tried, softAP feature is not working. It shows the option for it, mobile connects in static IP only, but still can't use PC connection data on phone. Tried on official website for solution but not succeed. mobile data on PC works flawlessly. Good speed also, if phone net is uninterrupted.

Subject: It's good and faithful product from tp link
Review: It's good and also working fine but it's service centre is so far in delhi it is in nehru place.i was using this dongle after 2 year it was showing some problem so I went to service centre and replace with new.

Subject: Perfect!
Review: A perfect adapter. My old one was not working for some reason and was giving speeds of 2-3 mbps speed on Speedtest on my 40 mbps Airtel connection. This resolved my problem and I now getting the full experience of true fast internet speeds (I used to have a 10 mbps connection so this is fast to me). also, it’s drivers get installed automatically when you plug it in if for some reason it does include a CD of the drivers in it or you can get it online you can also find them online!

Subject: best for desktop pc
Review: Works great on windows 7 and windows xp. It helps me to connect to internet through my mobile hotspot and gives fine great according to network. People who don't want to invest huge investment on wifi router setup and taking internet connection plans and facing all sorts of problem can buy this product according to their convinience

Subject: Beautiful Product
Review: It acts perfectly for my desktop PC as the Modem is in other room I want a WiFi adopter for the PC. The speed seems to be alright. Only initial installation is a little bit problem.

Subject: Very good product. In fact
Review: Very good product. In fact, I  was searching for a device to capture WIFI signals from my JioFi Dongle.My frined at Bangalore gave me this idea not to connect through a USB OTG Cable. Directly if this WiFi Adaptor for desktop is purchased then good quality speed internet can be obtained. I strongly recommend to go for "TP-Link TL-WN725N 150Mbps Wireless N Nano USB Adaptor".

Subject: Speed ​​is very good by value.
Review: Model Name is TL-WN725NTP LINK 150 Mbpsand its USB 2.0I am writing this review after 6 monthsAnd while using it, I never felt that if it was USB 2.0, it would have been better if it were 3.0.I am satisfied with this Product.Very easy to use.

Subject: very easy to connect wifi from traditional desktop
Review: very easy to connect wifi from traditional desktop, cd installation possible as well. got working in just 2 mins. Now we can use wifi from a standard desktop. avoids any LAN wired connection

Subject: Very short range.
Review: I purchased it to run hotspot on my computer, but Singal is only available in very short range of about 10-15ft only. And away from that it doesn't even shows up in WiFi network list. If I'm in range of about 10-15ft it keeps disconnecting continuously. So, don't buy if you're planning to use it for hotspot.Apart from that connecting to other WiFi is working fine. No issues.

Subject: Good product
Review: I had a work-issued Windows 10 desktop that didn't have Wi-Fi. I bought this thing, plugged it in, and the computer's network settings started listing Wi-Fi connections. I turned on the Wi-Fi hotspot on my phone, clicked "Connect", and entered the Wi-Fi password. That was it! Didn't need to use the installation disk at all.

Subject: Best product
Review: In amazon i got it for 350 only in snapdeal it was 560 rupees ....buy on big billion day .product is 5/5 .it is helpfull for laptops and desktop which dont have wifi drivers ....we can access wifi by connecting this to our system.I am using it for my dell vostro from 3 years no issues .

Subject: Plug & Play
Review: Add into USB Port and setup will take automatically... for Windows.You may also contact Tech Support... they are available to help

Subject: Easy. Plug-n-play. Wi-Fi.
Review: Form factorSmall dongle, easy to connectSetupSimple. Connect to a USB port, select WiFi from network icon, doneRecommended for anyone in search of WiFi adapter.Worked well for desktop, setup took less than 5 mins.

Subject: Works perfect
Review: I use this to connect my desktop to wireless router.  Had used it on Jio, ADSL, Netgear etc.  Installation is simple and works perfectly fine at 802.11n speed.

Subject: Excellent product to turn your desk top PC into a Wi fi Hotspot
Review: Delivered before time as usual by Amazon.  I bought this product for using it as a Wi fi Access point from a wired LAN for internet access from tab, mobile etc. The product came with a CD. Installation was smooth.  Plug in the Dongle in the USB port, put the CD in, run auto run, select option for install drive and configuration utility. After installation, for enabling Wi Fi hot spot you need to run the configuration utility and select the advanced option ( this is not shown in the quick installation guide) and enable the Soft AP option. You can rename the SSID of your access point and change the password; apply and save the changes and you are ready to go.  I did not check the max range and other features, but seems good.  Now you can connect your mobiles, tabs, laptops to your PC's wired internet connection through Wi fi Access Point. Go on, buy it! Happy Browsing!!!

Subject: Slowest Dongle in the market
Review: Very bad product by TP LinkNot transfering speed more than 10 mbps over 100 mbps connection.Never buy this one.. Chinese generic are much better.

Subject: Serious issue present for me.
Review: Drivers not support on windows 7.Redmi note 8 pro wifi hotspot not showing there but other mobiles wifi showing. Like redmi 4x realme 2 redmi note 8. I don't know more about this issue. Why only one mobile hotspot not showing there tried with desktop pc and laptop with all windows 8 windows 10 windows 7 same issue.

Subject: Worthy Purchase
Review: My laptop had Wi-Fi driver issues for more than 2 years now and nothing seemed to solve it.So I bought this today, though installing the driver was not very easy as the tp-link.com website wasn't responding well but I installed the driver from fulldrivers.com and I can give this USB Adapter 5 stars because it's working amazingly well.

Subject: Good product for desktop user
Review: Good product quantity. Speed upto 3mbps depending on wifi speed, easy installation with cd, i used this from 4 months, soo this product is really good for desktop user for external wifi, and its better than protable modem. You don't need driver when you use this on windows 10 any additions

Subject: Love It! It's been 4 Years and it's still working like new!
Review: This the product I wanna rate above Five stars!I just noticed today that I've been using this since 2016, earlier for a laptop and now on a desktop PC which even got it's parts replaced twice but this - Adapter remains the same! so I had to write this review.Thank you so much for this beautiful Product <3

Subject: Working Perfectly!
Review: Thanks a lot...I bought this after cutting my BSNL Broad Band Connection...so I was little anxious about the speed... First my PC didn't recognize the USB. So I went their website and downloaded the driver... Now everything is smooth...I'm getting 90% speed of Broad Band.. Happy ✌️

Subject: Saved the day
Review: My cousin's laptop's wifi was not working, some hardware issue was there. Bought this one for him. Works fine with the laptop. Signal reception is acceptable. It is very easy to use also.

Subject: Weak signal
Review: WiFi signal detection is weak.Buy only if the router is in the same room where you intent to use this product.Range is not mentioned in the description.Its easy to use and auto installs on a Windows 10 machine

Subject: ultimate product
Review: don't think just go for it ,very smart product in the price,very handy & and can be use as  multipurpose like in computer , led tv etc

Subject: Resolved My Signal Problem Due to Range between Rooms
Review: I was looking for a high gain adapter , the previous TP link model (Mini USB adapter) used to disconnect frequently , So i decided to buy new adapter for high range , then i bumped up into this model TP-Link TL-WN822N N300 , I am using it since a week now and I am happy with my decision ! Amazing strong signal despite my router being in living room and my desktop being in corner of my bedroom which is quite a distance.

Subject: Good for windows 7
Review: Working fine on Windows 7 able to connect with my home wifi even it is a chinese product. However it doesn't work on Windows XP.

Subject: Good download capacity, terrible stability
Review: Connection speed is okayish. I have a 110 Megabits/s connection and on Ookla Speedtest I'm getting about 93Megabits/s. Downloads can be carried on easily but this is not made for Gaming in any way! The connection stability is horrible. I suffer from multiple ping spikes and terrible stability. Would not recommend for gaming at all.

Subject: good fo Jiofi or Mobile net use
Review: Its working better with amazon basic USB extender cable for  better jiofi signal catch ,also good for mobile wifi potspot receiver .

Subject: WORKING FOR LONG TIME..GO FOR IT
Review: Fully satisfied.. Go for itIt is juts grabbing the Wifi like pro..Working for day and night..Very less price compared to the quality.Mrp in that is 1120..Size is very comfortable.(very tiny)GO FOR IT

Subject: Doesn't solve the purpose
Review: Wifi signal - its getting low signal even the router is in next room.Easy to install - I tried download drivers from Website but there are some version confusions with Same model. The version number is not mentioned in the product anywhere.Product quality is fine. But not working as expected.

Subject: Worth for money, but will not recommend
Review: Worth for money, but will not recommend, as it gets heated by time, because of heat its disconnecting and felt like the speed also reducing. Its ok to be used in home.

Subject: USB wireless adapter
Review: This permits you to add wi-fi to old computers/laptops. What I really like is that it includes drivers for some linux distros as well. I don't know if other brands have linux drivers. Works well once it is set up - quite an easy process.

Subject: This product is amazing. Network range is great
Review: This product is amazing. Network range is great. It has 2.4 GHz frequency band. A small green light blinks in this adapter and this looks pretty good.Only negative side I found is that creating a hosted network is not possible with this.

Subject: Defective Chinese product
Review: This is made in China product. It's download speed is only 2mbps on my 50mbps connection where as in my laptop I am getting more than 40mbps download speed.

Subject: Reliable Product
Review: Doesnt work well when connected directly to desktop CPU. There's some interference causing the speeds to be very slow.Connect it with a USB extension cable or a USB Hub ; This way wifi speeds are much higher.

Subject: Nice product 👌
Review: Nice product. Drivers are easliy available on official website of TP Link in case you don't have option to run CD in your PC. (details available in manual guide). Easy to install and use. Quality is also good. Signal strength is short.Overall all nice product that add wifi option to your PC 👌. I was using it in Windows 7.

Subject: Easy to use, recommended
Review: It is very easy to use. If desktop computer does not have wifi, buy this. Install the software and plug this in in USB port. Now you can use wifi internet.

Subject: Perfect for Pentesters
Review: This WLAN adapter is very good in quality,looks,operation,WiFi signal and speed. This works perfectly fine with kali Linux and Ubuntu and can be used as a pentest device, But you need to install repositories of rtl8188eus from github and write some commands to make it work with kali Linux and Ubuntu.

Subject: A very Handy and easy to use adapter for tower pc
Review: I am using this for 2 months now and I found the adapter is very handy when it comes to installation. Wifi signal is very good. I am pretty much satisfied after buying this.

Subject: Works nicely - small issue once in a while!
Review: Arrived fast. Working nicely. Once in a while I need to reinstall the driver. I think this more to do with my way of usage ( I oftern hibernate my laptop than actually shutdown) Sometimes I forget to 'eject' the USB and couple of such occassions on restart and re-insert it does not detect the Modem.I did all things, but no use. Finally I had to reinstall the driver  & s/w from the product CD sent. Till now i have done that three time in all.

Subject: Not easy to configure, inappropriate error messages
Review: Not able to configure the device. It tries to detect the wifi router, takes couple of minutes and then displays the error message 'Failed'. I couldn't try configuring the device earlier and when I planned to return it, I noticed that I missed the return window by just 1 day.

Subject: Disconnects frequently not good
Review: Using this with desktop. It’s not possible to play games online as it disconnects frequently and also it doesn’t support 5 GHz WiFi Routers but only 2.4 GHz ones. It’s plug and play with windows 10 which is the only good thing.

Subject: Go for it.
Review: If you need an awesome wifi USB adaptor just go for it. Set it up once and forget, it never requires any other attention. I am using it on my Windows 10 PC. It's too small that many times, it is left unnoticed!

Subject: Just works...as simple as it gets in plug and play
Review: This is as easy as it gets in plug and play wi-fi adapter. Just plug it in and it just works. I needed this delivered same day and Amazon set a new record for me in delivering this in 6 hours from the time I placed the order

Subject: An ok wifi adaptor
Review: Wifi signal could be improve. My default wifi adaptor show full signal but this one show one level below. Signal reception if more than 15 meter is poor compare to default adaptor...

Subject: Working perfectly with Kali Linux on VirtualBox (wn722n V3)
Review: I'm using Kali Linux on Virtual Box (kernel 5.4.0). Many of you have doubts about whether it will work in monitor mode or not.It works perfectly fine with some tweaks.I tested it in both Monitor Mode and Packet Injection, it works well.This device is version 3.The chip used inside is version 2 (Realtek rl8188)

Subject: Average Quality
Review: Good and budget friendly option for buyers. But, quality of product is below average. Wifi sometime disconnects automatically.

Subject: OK product
Review: Overall the product is OK the wifi signal got blocked very easily. I mean my chair block this adapter signal then i had to bought a usb extension to use the adapter otherwise good product.

Subject: Good Product for a Less Price.
Review: This is really a tiny product, by just looking the picture one can never judge how small is this product. It looks less golden compared to what the picture is showing. The setup manual is really easy to understand and it also provides 3years Manufacturing warranty as of 28-01-2019 and the price quoted on the box is ₹1149, the MRP. It's compatible with my Windows 10 Pro 64bit desktop.

Subject: Good quality reception
Review: Works at max throughput of the router and excellent coverage. Driver installation needed, it will not work out if box. I am using for my work station, pretty good.

Subject: Signal range and quality is dope!
Review: My desktop doesnt have a wifi card inbuilt so I bought this and plugged into it. The range is great and wifi signal quality is strong. I would definitely recommend this if you are living in 2bhk apartments.

Subject: Useless
Review: Not getting detected by my windows XP desktop.Tried multiple times with different methods but in vain.Simply useless...

Subject: Smooth running like butter
Review: I needed a wifi adapter for my pc. After reading through various reviews I finalised tp link usb wifi adapter over other wifi adapters. Believe me guys it is running pretty well. It comes with CD containing drivers. Easy to install and use. If u need a wi fi adapter.. Then close ur eyes and go for this product...

Subject: Perfect for Desktops with no WiFi card!
Review: I ordered this for the old Desktop computer at my parents place which had no WiFi card. I thought it is plug and play, but they had to eventually call a technician to install it for them. But it works perfectly!

Subject: Weak wifi signal pickup
Review: It's easy to use. The router is located 10 feet away from the pc in another room. It picks up very weak signals. YouTube videos buffer up while playing. It supports only 2.4G. Should have supported dual band. Currently serving the purpose.

Subject: Not worth it
Review: #NAME?

Subject: Do not buy this product, totally waste on money
Review: This device is not working as desired. Every time, I power on my system it is not connecting and I need to reinstall the driver. Now,  within a month it is not working at all. I contacted with TP link on robot application and they told me that they have no policy to refund as well.

Subject: False commitment...fooling people
Review: Its bad for linux as we cant use it with latest kernel version.....Even if you are inserting in USB and outputing 'lsusb -v' ...it shows nothing on ubuntu 14.04. waste of time and money ...contacted to TP-Link customer care she told and suggested me to check drivers before purchasing any TP-Link product.These cowards had mentioned only Linux they should mention kernel version older than (3.10) ...Most hectic that there is no any deb or rpm packages come with CD ....With CD you will find Linux folder where only single text file containing text like contact f..*kin website put our nasty finger and download kinky driver file version2 or Version1 (having 2 holes facility)...if someone have provision of internet why he/she would go for wifi device purchase ?? whats the use of CD then ??

Subject: Good quality
Review: Does what it's supposed to..as advertised on the box.  Works great with my tp link wifi modem.Long warranty is an additional bonus

Subject: Drivers are a mess
Review: Using on Linux. Proper driver is not present in mainline, only staging one.So for better performance need to find and compile driver. Not user friendly. Expensive.

Subject: Product not working....
Review: I bought this product on 29th October...as I am busy... That too old one is working... I didn't opened the pack.... When yesterday I opened and tried to use.... It's not working.... Bad luck and now whom I have to approach... Is there any replacement... Can some one fro Amazon side give responsible answer which benefits me.... If not sheet waste.......

Subject: Quite good for WIFI
Review: Quite good for WIFI.  Installation is quite simple.  However suggest installation software should have been  supplied on some other media as most of the computers does not come with CD drives these days.  I had to download it from the site.

Subject: Happy to buy
Review: This is product is really good and worth buying.!  One need to download the driver from CD provided but My laptop didn't have CD drive so I installed from the Tplink website... Everything was super easy.... Working good..!

Subject: Good product in price range
Review: Good product even working with windows10Its maximum speed is 72mbpsFor us we generaly not got that speed ever so i thing go for the cheaper oneIn the cheaper one you got atleast 5 mb wich is sufficient for us no need to buy this expensive product. We get any speed in cheaper not in india we foind cheaper and good internet speed in other countryes where at least 4g work good and gives us 30mbps speed normally

Subject: ⚠  This product won't connect to your mobile hotspot
Review: i dont like this product because it dose not recognize my mobile phone's hotspot at all i really find everything but there is nothing i can do i am pissed and it dose not have replacement option what the.... I am really pissed and my head hurts i leterally never gonna recommend this product at all to anyone in my life

Subject: Product has a Bug
Review: This product has a bug. Many a times it will not show up the wifi network you had previously connected to. Checked out their support page, looks like there are others who have faced this issue. There is no fix. Tried everything, restart pc, re install drivers, restart wifi router, every SOP.

Subject: Amazing
Review: Before buying I was confused or in dilemma that whether it will fulfill my need or not , but when I get this it's amazing , Just plug and play .. Connectivity is good , no impact on speed you will surely get same speed which are getting on wifi..

Subject: Good but delicate router
Review: The router is very compact and good at woking speed. But the only minus point is that it is very delicate. Pluging in it for first time into my desktop, it take little effort but that's ok. Problem rise while removing the router. While removing the black colour plastic cover is easily came out. Thats not expect from this costly product.

Subject: Good handy product
Review: bought it for the express purpose of connecting my desktop to my mobile through its hotspot. It is doing a good job. its range also quite good. It picks up my WiFi signal about 30 feet away across walls and windows upstairs. Good value for money.

Subject: Works Best
Review: A good wifi receiver. Works good and without fail. Been using over a week and no complaints since. BTW using with my Windows 7 desktop

Subject: No setup needed
Review: I just plugged it into my Windows 10 PC, and it started working. I only had to input my Wifi password.  No other driver installation was needed. Great value for money.

Subject: Version 3 with Monitor mode and packet injection
Review: very nice product.its july 2020 and they selling version 3 of this product which supports monitor mode and packet injection in Linux.yes it supports Linux.it also shows far signal which can not see in ur phone but this can show u.

Subject: won't help in increasing internet speed
Review: good for getting range but no change in speed.With this adapter I saw multiple wifi networks which were not in range earlier butthere is no difference in internet speed.Finally have to move router near to my desktop for getting proper speed.

Subject: Doesn't ever reaches the advertised speed, tops out at 72mbps connection speed.
Review: Doesn't ever reaches the advertised speed, tops out at 72mbps connection speed. Tech support i.e. Drivers available easily in tp link website, nothing to configure. Jusy plug and forget it hence pretty easy to use.The only con is the speed issue mentioned above.

Subject: Full stisfied
Review: Even though my laptop have wifi i tried internet through this dangal i really shocked . This dongale giving 10 times better speed than laptop wifi unbuilt adapter. If you are working at low speed problem then must tried once if not work return.but I am full satisfied.

Subject: Satisfied, Easy to use
Review: I bought this product almost three months back and till now it has been working exactly as per specifications mentioned. im satisfied and happy with the product.

Subject: Good for a cheap product but range is bad
Review: This thing is good & Cheap but the range to connect is horrible..it somtimes loses connection or runs slow, i have 12mbps internet with this i get 4mbps.u need to keep ur TP link near the wifi about 1m to 2m so it can get 4 to 6mbps.

Subject: Not best for hacking, good for casual use
Review: If you are using it for hacking don't buy this but if you are buying it for casual use then its fine. Does support linux operating system but to enable monitor mode and packet injection you have to follow some steps.

Subject: Awesome product
Review: Nice product for the price. Connection seems to be pretty stable. I have used it with both Windows as well as Linux Debian Jessie. Works well with both Operating systems, even though I needed to install some files in Linux. In Windows it was just Plug and Play.Build quality is really nice and its really small in size.

Subject: A Must Have Product ❤️
Review: It is very easy to use. Working like a charm. Thanks to TP-Link. Hope it last longer more than 3 Years (as they mentioned 3 Years Warranty).I’ll update the review if I face any issue. Till then Happy Wi-Fiying :)#Peace

Subject: Disappointed, Works for only 3 weeks
Review: Looks good initially, easy to use.But worked hardly for 3 weeks.Now, it's not working. Not even detecting in Machine as USB device. Waste of money if ₹499 device works for 3 week.

Subject: Strong but slow
Review: It has good build quality and you can leave it turned on for days without worrying that something may happen, apart from build the network speed it bit poor compared with other adapters, takes you upto 4-5mbps max

Subject: Excellent
Review: If boosting is not much of concern and mobile phone will be available in the same room, I strongly recommend to go with this product. Excellent value for money. Great quality!

Subject: Disappointing product.
Review: With my broadband giving 40Mbps.. speed on tplink not even reaching 4Mbps. Connectivity is very unstable and frequent disconnection is happening.Tested with my mobile usb tethering and i am able to achieve full boradband speed. Not even good for browsing.very disappointed.

Subject: Go for High gain if you are in next room to Router
Review: The product is Good. Easy to install and use but my router is not in same room as my computer is.... I felt having the unit with more gain would be better.Earlier I was using TP-Link TL-WN722N which was quite Good in data speed. This one is so-so if you are bit faraway from your router.

Subject: Awesome product...
Review: I am using this nano adapter from last 6 months for my desktop and recently purchased for laptop becasue my wifi card somehow not working.  Believe me its best adapter that u can order wo any hesitation. Both desktop amd lappy wifi working flawlessly.Pros -1. Small and very sleek2. Plug n play.  No need to do any installation of driver. Working on Win7 n Win10.3. Connects immediately to wifi like mobile wifi. Specifically mentioning this bz my lappy use to take lot of time to connect wifi.4. Very cheap as compared to other branded adapters.Cons -1. Range is issue. It works fine in near by room but not more than 10-15mtr2. Due to its design,  little bot difficult to remove from usb port.So overall dont wait if u want to purchase. Awesome product.

Subject: Best WIFI Enable Product in the Market
Review: Excellent one. It enables the WIFI link with in few seconds after the proper Driver installation from the DVD drive. Non WIFI Computer desktop users can go Blindly if they wish to add the WIFI option to their PC's. Best Product in the Market !!!

Subject: Support CP Plus camera
Review: I have connected this device on CP Plus Astra DVR, Its working very smoothly with high range and speed. Now DVR not required LAN cable for Internet.

Subject: Great one
Review: Works like a charm, just google the drivers and install them. Plug in the adapter only after the driver setup asks to do it. Superb product and delivery.

Subject: Best In Market!
Review: There are several Nano USB in market, but this one is absolutely brilliant. I just plugged in my Windows 10 PC and it automatically detected and started to seek my mobile Hotspot Wifi. Product quality is fantastic with its golden outlook and really really tiny. I couldn't even see it protruding  after I plugged into my PC. Strongly recommend to everyone who wants their PC's to use Mobile/Router WiFi.

Subject: Value for money.
Review: Full marks for compatibility and wifi signal range. Super easy to install and easy to use, it's basically just plug and play.100% compatible with ubuntu, windows and Mac.

Subject: Tiny Master
Review: This TP-Link TL-WN823N 300Mbps Mini Wireless-N USB Adapter connected well with TP-Link WiFi router and was working well with old PC having no inbuilt WiFi. Installation and configuration was easy. WiFi signals and Speed was excellent with no buffer required.

Subject: Works flawlessly
Review: Compatible with windows10, Ubuntu 18.04, 20.04.Nice signal capturing.Only cons is sometimes after restart os does not recognise wifi adaptor so I have to reinsert the adaptor. And everything is good

Subject: Great product!
Review: Got the product half an hour ago, plugged it right away and it started detecting our wifi signal immediately. I didn't have to install the drivers (although they did give a CD with the adaptor). You guys can definitely go for it, happy shopping :)

Subject: Pls do good packaging
Review: Product is good but packaging is very very poor main package was damage even cd is broken. Since main wi fi adapter small in size that's why it is safe. Pls do not send item directly with only plastic wrap. Packaging was worst.

Subject: Awesome adapter just go for it...
Review: I have been using this adapter since last couple of months and i must say the speed is great. I have ordered it for my hackintosh laptop. It works like charm although i have to install its 3rd party driver kext to get it work bcoz the driver that comes with it doesn't have support for catalina. Overall good product go for it you won't regret for buying it....

Subject: Value for money
Review: Well it is a TPLink product so assuming it is a good product. Just bought it, so lets see how long and trouble free it lasts to know of the actual quality of the product. So far so good.

Subject: Very good on USB 3.0 but not on USB 2.0 and windows 8.1 though box says USB 2.0 compatible
Review: One star less only because it is not installing on win 8.1 with USB 2.0 while very coolly installs on win 10 with USB 3.0. But box says compatible with USB 2.0

Subject: Extremely dissappointed! Wifi reception is poor.
Review: Wifi reception is poor. It begins to show problems right after return/refund window is closed so now I am stuck with this substandard product. My money is wasted. Please do not commit the same mistake.

Subject: Nice. Works well with WINDOWS but strugles with LINUX
Review: Works well with windows. I did'nt have to even install any driver on Win10.But, with Linux ( UBUNTU 18.04 LTS and CENTOS 7) the device was'nt recognized automatically.The driver support (from the TP-link website) t for Linux didn't work well. And I had to find third party driver that were hard to install as well.

Subject: Good for Kali Linux
Review: Work fine kali linux. People who are checking for kali linux, you can go ahead and buy this. This is v3.2 device from seller Appario Retail. Supports monitor mode.

Subject: A good product and timely delivery
Review: I gave a wrong delivery feedback by mistake please take a 5 star rating for delivery as well as product was delivered on time correctly but was picked up by a different flat member.

Subject: Not working with Linux and Raspberry-pi
Review: Seller service as well as Amazon service is very good. No issue related to product still rating is low because of following reasons,1. Windows 7/8/8.1 requires installation of driver to detect & work the device.2. After lots of efforts failed to make device working on Raspberry-pi and on Linux (CentOS 7/Ubuntu 14/15).I think it's tp-link firmware upgrade issue because I have same device model which I purchased earlier will not require any external driver to install on Windows/Linux platforms.  Also, difference in packaging of same product model. Earlier, it comes in small box compare to this box packaging.

Subject: Minr product is faulty
Review: Well it works, but by own choice, it connevts ro wifi when it wants, when i want it does not. My phone is catching wifi but it does not. It catches Neighbour s wifi but mine does not even appear. After when i have plugged wire for net, than it starts working, so it loses its whole purpose.  Felt like i ami robbed of my money

Subject: Easy to use
Review: Just the thing I wanted. Now I can connect my mobile data to the computer. Works perfectly fine.Very useful product. Must buy.Edit 26/02/2020:it's been more than 1 year since the purchase. Still works like a charm.. very good quality. Must buy

Subject: Good Wireless Internet Adapter
Review: The product is so good. It's very easy to use.I don't have CD drive in my desktop but It's adapter driver can easily downloadable from their site. It's very easy to install. But WiFi signal is bit low . It have Good teachnical support.

Subject: Excellent and Reliable
Review: Its great. Superfast connectivity, no lag, no speed issue. Its been 3 years I am using it. Its really "plug and forget" device. Never had to think about connecting after restarting the PC/laptop. It automatically detects and connects.

Subject: Quality
Review: The best i found in this product is that I dont have to do much to install and found any connection... it works automatucally. Sometimes it turns off then i have to unplug and reconnect it and all problem got solved.

Subject: Excellent....
Review: Excellent....inbuilt wifi chip of my dell i5 desktop was just getting one bar and lagging in internet access being located at other end of my house but after connecting this it received full bars. Now I am able to get fast internet access....

Subject: Best Wifi Adapter.
Review: Nice Product. Using it with my Laptop. Earlier tried many products but this is the best one. Don't go for cheap ones.PROS:-1) Value for money.2) Easy to set.3) Good Range.4) Capable of creating hotspot.5) Compatible with linux and windows.6) Small size.7) Trust of TP-link and amazon.8) Manual easy to follow.CONS:-STLL SEARCHING FOR ONE.I recommend to buy the product from experience.

Subject: Value for money
Review: The driver at TP Link website did not work for me but I got one on Github (Linux). This took me a day to figure out. Finally I was able to put it on Monitor mode. I'm giving 5 stars only because of its cheap price compared to other Linux compatible monitor mode adapters.

Subject: great connectivity, Thats enough
Review: If you are looking for making your wired PC into wireless broadband receiver, then this product is internationally most acclaimed for its cheap price and the best connectivity. Don't put bad thoughts in mind, just buy this

Subject: Superb..Recommonded..
Review: Simply amazing. Initially, i had some issues in configuring the device in my Windows 10.. After that, this works like a charm. Excellent speed as it promised, including live streaming from my Cyberlink Media server to my home Wi-Fi devices without any glitches.

Subject: Worst product
Review: I want to give it 0 star worst product at first it give me the speed of 10 to 15 mbps then next day not more than 1 mbps... And dont use it for penetration purpose didnot support kali

Subject: Easy and Effective!
Review: Very easy setup and works flawlessly. Recently, I have ended up purchasing TP Link products over D Link due to aggressive pricing, haven't faced am issue till now and I hope they maintain the quality of their products.

Subject: plug and play for ubuntu 20.04
Review: I was worried about the compatibility of the product with ubuntu 20.04 before purchasing. But it works fine with it. Just plug and play.

Subject: Very nice Product.
Review: Very nice and tiny product. Easy to fit in any laptop.Body quality is not hard. So if you hit or drop or fall from height there is a chance of breaking.For me nice products. Using last 1.5 year

Subject: TP-Link TL-WN725N 150Mbps Wireless N Nano USB Adapter
Review: It does the job. I used it with my laptop , as it's in build wifi signal is not working. So instead of repairing, I brought this. it's powerful enough for the house.

Subject: Really like its working good
Review: I like this small adopter very fast connect to WiFi connection but its too delicate item care fully handle this... Plastic body is not a good strength but working is super fast I like it thanks to Amazon and TP Link bye

Subject: Best adapter for pc to connect wifi
Review: Bit costlier but all the functions are excellent, wds supported,can identify distant wifi also which mobile also is unable to.Over all happy with this product even it's 3 days back only i got it delivered

Subject: Good, simple and efficient.
Review: Plug and play. Windows 10 doesnt need the drivers, but if you guys want to check out the functionality then you can install their app.Is it too much to say - the product would have been better if the size were reduced?Because it tends to bend and would damage the device if you're not 'very careful'Good product.

Subject: Superb for moderate use with reasonable price @399
Review: It's truily value for money @399 . Very easy to install & updated driver is available in Tp link website. Very small in size so doesn't impact visibility. Green blinking light is nice too. Works fine within  6-8 ft from the wifi source.  Overall Very good for moderate Internet accessibility.

Subject: TP-Link WN772N for 667/-
Review: Very good product easy to install good build quality..BUT THE ANTENNA IS USELESS I CHOSED THIS MODEL AND THOUGHT IT WOULD HAVE MUCH MORE RANGE BUT IT HAS USUALLY SAME RANGE LIKE NORMAL PHONE OR LAPTOP's WIFI.

Subject: Best in class Wireless Adapter
Review: Size is Soooo small that you'd not even see it once you've attached it on your PC-Built is great-Range is good enough but limited to 8-10 ft as far as I've checked it.-Software from the website lets you create a hotspot from your PC and that helped me to transfer files wireless from my Android phone as fast as with wire or even faster-Speed is great-Got it at discounted price on Amazoncons- none

Subject: Nice wifi adapter from Tp-Link
Review: Works perfectly. Bought it for Work from home during COVID19 lockdown situation. Serving the purpose very well. It supports 2.4 GHz wifi band which gives Internet speed around 30-35 mbps.Overall easily available and reliable product.

Subject: Worth the price
Review: Just got the product one day early. Product seems good and very compact . In window 10 just plug and play .it works flawlessely.

Subject: Simply superb portable travel adapter.
Review: Good wifi signal reception,Easy to install with Driver CD & online support.Easy to use, just plug & play,Not sure about driver updates.It has dedicated WPS button.

Subject: Useless
Review: Keep on getting error (limited internet).Disconnect device and it start running again.But such a drag to keep on disconnecting and reconnecting again and again

Subject: Gets the job done
Review: Gets the job done , good speed but ping is little higher ( 5ms on my mobile vs 16 using this adapter on PC ) . But it's really easy to use, jist plug and start browsing. I bought it for its 3 year of warranty

Subject: After a month or two still working good. A nice product at this price point
Review: Started working as soon as it was connected to the computer as expected with Windows 10 without any drivers installation. After a month or two still working good. A nice product at this price point.

Subject: Product unreliable
Review: I have ordered this product thrice in last 2 years.. inspite of stating a 3 year warranty the 1st time it stopped working in 10 months.. next time 9 months and this time it just went off in 4 months.. last I ordered in May 2018

Subject: Very good value for money.
Review: Good product. Able to connect to wifi from a distance of about 25 to 30 ft, separate room. Using in a PC. Happy.

Subject: I have been using it for more than a year no issue.
Review: Happy with the product, using it for more than a year without issue i can only recommend it to everyone. Setting up was a little hard but it might be an issue with my computer only. Good product overall.

Subject: Not for gaming.
Review: This is not the product for gaming as it couldn't get the wifi signals properly when my wifi is just outside my room. If you want to get an adapter for gaming go buy the white ones with antena

Subject: Excellent
Review: Don’t underestimate considering it as 150 mbps. It’s really fast, authentic and never let you down, it’s ready whenever you need it since connectivity is stable and never forget it has three years warranty as well, come on go for it without second thought

Subject: ... day may b due to sunday till now its good had been a month my lappy wifi was not ...
Review: applied for same day delivery got in two day may b due to sunday till now its good had been a month my lappy wifi was not working so it helped me out just install the CD Small one and it is started was not expecting it would b so easy there are cheaper one of this item too also see them too before buying

Subject: Multiple use dongle
Review: Plug and windows automatically detects the dongle ,this is my fourth order ,I have also used one desktop connected via HDMI cable (using graphic card) for Mi TV , working marvelous

Subject: Awesome product in this price
Review: Best item in this priceAwesome  build qualityNever drops signalsNever disconnected by itselfI got extra usb cable to connect from farPlug and play no need to install any kond of drivers

Subject: Great product if you are tired of using those lan cables in your old pc !!
Review: Had an old pc with no wifi so i bought this Tp link usb wifi.It works very well and the user interface is very simple.Great internet speed no lags.Only CON i experience is that after PC boots up..it takes about 2-3 minutes for the internet to be available on pc.So you have to wait for about 2-3 minutes everytime you start your pc to use the internet.Other than that no issues..

Subject: Good WiFi router.
Review: Support WiFi Protected Setup (WPS). No need to enter WiFi Password. Press WPS button of the adaptor and router for authentication and get connected. Also possible to connect manually by entering router wireless password.

Subject: Nice WIFI Adapter
Review: It's a mini wifi adapter. just plug n play for windows. Is good in what it's meant for. Using for last 2 months,  No issues till now.

Subject: Auto plug Wifi dongle
Review: This is a very good Wifi adaptor. Fetches Wifi signal across 2-3 room (2 Wooden Doors)The primary reason to buy this adaptor was accessing High-speed 5Ghz wifi on my PC.But unfortunately, it does not Show any 5ghz wifi networks.I have windows 7 in my desktop, I don't need to install any driver it's auto plug device.

Subject: Great device. "Chota packet bada dhamaka"
Review: It's a tiny little device which you can plug into the USB port of your pc or laptop which does not have wifi option. Set it up using the driver cd provided and you are good to go. I'm using it on pc which is in another room quite far from my wifi router and I still get the signal. Speed is also good.

Subject: Wifi speed slow when connected through adapter, works fine without adaptor
Review: Doesn't give good speed. My WiFi works perfectly fine when connected to my other laptop and mobile phones. I bought this to connect to a desktop. But the purpose is not served. I am having trouble in getting consistent and good speed in desktop. Please help, anyone has inputs?

Subject: Works
Review: After 2 weeks of usage, it works.*Installation was easy on a Windows 7 computer, attach the adapter, put the CD in and install at few clicks.*Tiny, you won't notice, except the green LED flashing*Compared to other products of same utility, seems a bit pricey, I hope it lasts long.

Subject: Easy to use
Review: It is support monitor mode and pocket injection  really  nice but  external fille and software  required  I use last three month really good and extra usb cable is  good quality wire i really happy

Subject: Software not found.
Review: CD doesn't contain any software. I received an empty CD. I did download the software from tp-link website. And the rest is fine.

Subject: Good buy
Review: My desktop didn't have Wi-Fi adapter and my old adapter wasn't receiving signal in my study room when the router it in living room. This works like magic and now I'm connected on my desktop.

Subject: A good product to buy !!
Review: Great service by Amazon prime!. The product got delivered the next day as promised. Good product, because of its small size it has become part of my laptop, so no need to take out and connect everytime. Quite easy to install. It will work on both Windows and MAC OS so not to worry, only thing that installation process is different which is clearly mentioned on the pamplet. Moreover if you dont have the CD drive you can install the software from TP link website.My laptops wifi card was damaged so this little thing has sorted out my problem , now i can easily connect to wifi.Worth to buy instead of changing your wifi card.Moreover I trust TP link.

Subject: Works like a charm
Review: This is the second time I am buying this dongle. Unlike other dongles, the built-in driver gets installed automatically.The small size and plug and play features are awesome.

Subject: A very nice product. But as a Linux user I find ...
Review: A very nice product. But as a Linux user I find it quite disappointing as no out of the box Linux driver ( neither Deb or Tar.gz) was available. Used the XP driver with NDISWRAPPER on Mint and it worked like a charm.Changing USB ports require additional configuration. Otherwise would have given it five stars.

Subject: Small but Strong
Review: I have used this USB drive for 1 month and it is still working on its full capacity i.e., 150 mb/s with file sharing and all, [and obviously internet speed matters on your network service provider]. It's very easy to use. Just plug it in and it works, not necessary to install drivers.

Subject: Good Product for so far.. 1 week after review.
Review: Purchased the product when the laptops WIFI card got damaged. this product does the job alternately. easy installation, connectivity is fine, range is also good.

Subject: works like a chram in win 10
Review: its works perfect in win10 no driver cd needed to install software. and it works and connect so fast.  dont think twice for any other product go for it. size is same what given in the images very handy and small.

Subject: very good
Review: Actually this one is very kind helpful for hotspot internet user works too good and very thin light weightsuperb technology by TP link hats off you.

Subject: Don't buy this ...to know read the review
Review: This device is not compatible with windows 10 and linux dives the chip set which is been used is not adiquate to those machines and the offical company website dosent provide any support please don't buy this  product  because drivers are also old one and company is not released the new drivers

Subject: Seamless access to network connectivity
Review: There is no issue in signal reception. This is quite fast enough to connect to the established(saved) wifi network. I felt no issue regarding speed, connectivity failure while using for long hours. The application provided in the CD is helpful to connect, track signal level and other related activity. I strongly recommend this product.

Subject: A Good Tiny Wireless Adaptor for PC
Review: I have bought this on 11 March 2018 for ₹434. I used it on my pc which runs on windows 10, it wroks pretty well . Just insert the adaptor and then use the given CD to install driver. I have witnessed speed upto 22Mb using mobile hotspot (jio 😉 ). On box it says 3 year warranty. Product looks premium and good. It looks like its range is not upto the mark but it works well.

Subject: The best wi-fi dongle for PC
Review: Using it since a month now. It's really catches wi-fi signal well. It provides great speed and the connection remains stable.

Subject: Perfect Product
Review: Well, writing this after using it for about 3 momths.This is a perfect product with strong signal. I couldn't find any difference in terms of speed with cable and after connecting this device.Built is decent and compact. I like the copper input.

Subject: Awesome product
Review: For me, no need to install any software just plug and connect. My laptop wifi was not working so i bought this and it is working very good.

Subject: Simply amazing product by TP link :):):):)
Review: An amazing substitute for people who are fed up with limited access problem due to network card on their PC's or laptops. It has amazing range. Since, it is a nano USB n/w adapter so there is no need to take care of it, Just plug and forget it :):):):)

Subject: Limited performance
Review: Range is limited due to internal antenna. Best for near distances. A single wall between router (20ft) dongle drops the bar to a dot even on different channels. Higher encryption class and password length will drop speed compared to an open channel.

Subject: Very user friendly gadget
Review: Very useful product. Works fine with JIO. Speed is good for personal use. Download speed also good. It is compatible with my P4 windows XP and Windows 7 PCs. Bought it for ₹ 450 and it's value for money. So go for it.

Subject: Five Stars
Review: This is good product and work well as i aspect, i just order this product for the purpose of hostednetwork hotspot and it work wonderful, to turn your internet pc into wireless hotspot guy go for this product ,,,,

Subject: Good not the best...@..399rs
Review: Good product but there is an issue with the quality.If you insert that adapter you have to struggle while removing it. poor plastic material. maximum chances of missing due to its very small size..but overall good product and easy to use..happy with the purchase.😀😀

Subject: Best Wi-Fi Card For Hackers/Normal Users
Review: Best WiFi card everFor hackers, this is the best Bcoz it supports all modes I.e monitor, master etc.Amazon delivered this product on time and I was very thankful for the sameI have been using this product for last 2 months and I am very much impressed.Also it has long range capacity I.e it can be used for long range hotspot and can capture WiFi which is far away.It comes with a double USB which is very usefulOverall, this is a very good Wifi card and I suggest everyone to buy this without hesitation

Subject: Great Connectivity and Range
Review: Great Connectivity. Arrived in mint condition. Very well packaged. Compatible with Windows 7 but not with Windows 10. Of course it does work with Windows 10 but the O.S. installs its own drivers. With Windows 7, the drivers from the accompanying CD must first be installed. But overall, working is good both, in terms of Signal Reception and Range Covered. Highly recommended. Five Stars!!!

Subject: Very good, using it on my Desktop with Ubuntu 16
Review: Very good, using it on my Desktop with Ubuntu 16.4 (had to download and install open source driver, can search on google). But no issue afterwords. reasonably good range and signal.

Subject: Reliable , Small, Reasonably priced
Review: Works just fine for me. But TP - link s/w provide no Soft AP / Hotspot feature. Byt I can use it as a hotspot by using connectify. Range is OK

Subject: Very good.
Review: Product is very good and does it job perfectly. While mobile shows 3 point signal level, this shows 5 point signal.!  Would have been better for display if it has a port in the back also (top), because while we keep it on desktop, cable from back of CPU has to come to the front, which looks awkward and some times it changes the device position. So I placed the device facing the wall, so the light too.

Subject: Excellent product
Review: Works as advised. Connection is stable on wifi and works well.  Also while its not as small as the older model, it continues to be relatively unobtrusive.Excellent value for money, if you need a wifi dongle for a desktop. Also works on laptops where the wifi modem is giving trouble.

Subject: This supports only 2.4ghz signal
Review: This is product which is good for 2.4ghz which is discreet and doesn't support 5ghz which is nowhere mentioned hence uploaded the back side pic, this item doesn't have a return/refund and provides only replacement of the same item hence careful if you don't read properly this may Fool you.

Subject: Does not work with latest linux versions
Review: Drivers are not available for latest linux kernel versions (above 4.10). I don't suggest to buy this product if you are going to use in linux with kernel > 4.10.

Subject: Excellent Product
Review: My laptop wifi has issues hence tries this product. Works very smoothly my wifi issues has been solved. only one issues Just it works on 2Ghz not on 5 Ghz

Subject: PLEASE 🙏 DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
Review: Pathetic Product , I have lost my money,please do not buy this product , does not work as described , very poor connectivity , frequent disconnections using internet even when using right next to the device !  PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT !

Subject: Best product at this price range 👌
Review: WiFi signal is best at this price range.Installation is also very easy.My cd driver is not working properly.In their website they provide the installation software for all model pc.By using that we can install the software required for its working. simply GO FOR IT✌️

Subject: It has nano reception
Review: What I liked - The size, it's very smallWhat I didn't liked - It has poor receptionOver all - Don't buy it. You have to keep it with in 2 meter from wifi router, to make it work.

Subject: Substitute for PC
Review: good connectivity along with a good range. Also easy to install. An amazing product at this range. Have been using it for quite a while now and still no problems have arised.

Subject: Amazing product.
Review: My internal wireless adaptor got damaged so I ordered this product.It is small and compact.Very good to use.Good speed and connectivity.Is everything the product description says.Recommended to everyone.

Subject: Had no issues with Win10 while I faced a lot of issues with other Wifi Dongles on Win10 Good build
Review: Works well and has a low profile.  Had no issues with Win10  while I faced a lot of issues with other Wifi Dongles on Win10Good build quality

Subject: Its a good product
Review: Its a good product Its a good product Its a good product Its a good product Its a good product Its a good product Its a good product Its a good product Its a good product Its a good product Its a good product Its a good product

Subject: Value for money
Review: I purchased this so that I could connect my PC to my jiofi device. It works well with other wifi access points as well. Item was delivered on time, packing was good and performance is satisfactory. It is value for money.

Subject: Unable to install Windows XP computer
Review: I tried a lot but was unable to get internet in my windows XP desktop computer. I installed CD and checked with settings but did not work.

Subject: Plug and play
Review: I'm using it on windows 10 on my 8 year old PC. All I had to do is plug it in and it detected my WiFi. It didn't prompt me to download any drivers from internet or to use the included CD. Super convenient and easy to use. 5 stars from my side.

Subject: A good product .
Review: Works best. Good to go and builds a wireless connection between any devices. Supports a strong connection and it's been 2 years and still works smoothly ...a best product for wireless connection through WiFi . The box contains . A disc, installation guide, and TP link .

Subject: Highly recommended
Review: Great productEasy to usePlug and playCons: Cant connect to two devices at a time even though it supports Bluetooth 4.0

Subject: Awesome wifi adapter with great functionality! WIFI+HOTSPOT+ACTIVE WIFI
Review: Thank you Amazon for super-speed delivery even during season sale.My packaging is very good with premium look.TP-Link utility application is user friendly and could connect to any network easily.I configured this wireless adapter in my Windows 10 desktop and it worked flawless without any external drivers.But Tp-link utility is a must installation for those who need to establish hotspot.I was able to share my fixed connection through softAP mode and also I was able to connect to wifi and share wifi connection through hotspot simultaneously without fixed connection.I highly recommend this product. Believe me, it worth every penny!

Subject: Good value for money
Review: Great alternative to buying a new WIFI card (comparatively pricey). So far I have found no problems with it. I had bought earlier a cheaper kind and that did not work at all. However, this does exactly what it says and when plugged in it will connect to your WIFI network right away. It comes with a CD and a little literature book to guide you for installing it on PC.

Subject: Ok product.
Review: The product is good, small amd easy to access. Signal strength are good as well, though it doesn't have any antenna.There is an inbuilt LED inside the adapter, which is keep blinking when connected to a network, quite distracting and annoying.

Subject: This doesn't support monitor mode!!!!!
Review: This is a great network adapter but if you're using kali linux and want want to enable monitor mode please DON'T BUT THIS as you'll get a v2 adapter which doesn't support monitor mode. There are three versions for this adapter in which v2 doesn't support monitor mode. This adapter is completely useless for me as i just needed it for that reason. Luckily i got but money back.

Subject: worksss like a charmm
Review: it works like  a charm. remember it is version 1.xx  so it can be used in monitor mode easily.chipset used inside tthis doesn't require any drivers to be installed ( windows, kali ....  )i got this at 688 in a deal

Subject: Very nice product. Recommended
Review: This is a great product. I have been using this for years. This is a newer version with antenna is also great. Very easy to install even on my old pc.

Subject: Plug and Perform
Review: Delivery wasn't an issue. The product itself was in pristine condition. It is quite easy to install. and takes less than 15 minutes from understanding the process to start surfing online. (Just make sure you have all the necessary information about the router you wish to connect to)

Subject: Must buy. Very much recommend.
Review: Awesome product. Package was very simple but no damages on the box of the product. Genuine product. At this range I think this is the best, but little disappointed because the country of origin is china.

Subject: It's a shame tp link
Review: Worst experience ever.After 1 month the device starts making problems.Wifi automatically disconnects, speed drops.But most pathetic news is tp link customar care dont want to repair or replace it they are just saying some nonsense tricks.. why it comes with 3 year warranty tplink ?

Subject: Excellent, Value for Money
Review: Dont have anything bad to write againat this product... Except its small which is a bonus because it doesnt hamper the other USB device

Subject: Working fine for Ubuntu 18.4 without additional drivers
Review: It's working absolutely fine for Ubuntu 18.4 without any additional drivers installed. In the reviews which were already there, I couldn't find any feedback for Ubuntu 18.4. In other sites, many said additional drivers need to be installed, but not required. Simply I plugged in USB prot. It detects and gave password. Simply fantastic, :-)

Subject: Very Good Product
Review: I would surely promote this product . It really serves my purpose. People who are using Laptop without WiFi or people who have WiFi in the hall but want to have the computer in your bedroom.. just purchase this . It will help you a lot in accessing the Internet with the same speed ..

Subject: Bad product, can't find router
Review: Bad product, not able to detect my router, totally unreliable. My Airtel router is just 2 meter away but it can't find it 19 out of 20 times. Fed up didn't expected such a horrible gadget from tp link. Also can't access 5 ghz network

Subject: Happy customer
Review: Does what it says. Had to install the driver from internet. Rest was easy. Happy with the speed and connectivity. Definitely a much cheaper solution to getting my wireless card replaced on the laptop.

Subject: Best Laptop WiFi replacement.
Review: Really good and small you almost forget about it unless you need a USB port, other than the fact that it takes up a usb port this is a piece of gem.This is going to be better than most of the preinstalled laptop WiFi cards and gives better performance. If you have wifi issues with your laptop and don't have warranty go for this one.Amazon please speed up your delivery you are only going to lose customers if you don't develop your own delivery system.5 Stars: For product3 Stars: For slow delivery even for PRIME customers

Subject: Good product. Highly recommend to any one who has ...
Review: I am using it on my laptop to extend the wifi range from my router. It captures the wifi signals where my laptop can't find any.Good product. Highly recommend to any one who has issues connecting internet from default wifi card on laptop.

Subject: Useless, stay away from it.
