Review: One of the worst adapter's, keeps dropping the signal, doesn't get recognised in the os, need to reboot the system for it to recognise. My other router has no problems connecting, yet this one can't get the signal to even one bar.

Subject: Not so good
Review: Has some driver issues in windows 10....many times it refuses to connect to the wifi router...but when it connects it has good range and works nice...but most of the time it is a trouble...so i would look for something else

Subject: The perfect wifi card replacement
Review: Easy to use just plug and play, drivers would be installed by internet.Recommended.

Subject: Just for wifi not for kali
Review: It's the newer version so please don't buy if ur going to use it for any hacking purposes it can't send packages or recieves so it's work is only for using wifi on any systemTo connect to wifi only

Subject: I got frustrated some time
Review: Tp link is best brand when compare to dlink in my view but when i using this i hate tplink products it stops suddenly and some time speed is not comming properly what is this amazon and tp link

Subject: it's good for browse internet with hotspot connect but sharing files ...
Review: it's good for browse internet with hotspot connect but sharing files with share it is  not really good it sucks the speed average speed of file transfer with mobile in this modem is 256kb to 5mb per second but it only reach the high level transfer while your mobile near the dongle only other wise its not good average speed at 1 to 5 feat near....

Subject: Great wifi adapter
Review: Unlike other cheap small adapters this one doesn't get disconnected at all from any wifi hotspot which was a problem I faced with my old small USB wifi adapter,this one is truly worth it's price

Subject: Personally a waste
Review: The product has come with a cd to set up which is not helpful for me personally as my CPU does not have a CD drive. Alternate measures would have been helpful.

Subject: Quality Product by Tplink
Review: The product is good with stable signal strength and connectivityThe only thing that is missing in this is the 5G Wifi signal compatibility. It should be a norm now.

Subject: Product is working as it intended to
Review: Just plug it into the machine, it just works fine. Driver installation is not required for Windows 10 machines (my device is Win 10)

Subject: It's working perfectly and my purpose is solved.
Review: It's working perfectly and my purpose is solved. Most importantly it is very easy use. Just like we insert a pendrive. Nice product.

Subject: Not better than tenda
Review: Before i used tenda usb wifi router.. I would say i should not have moved on to this one. Tenda is so freaking fast than this. Tp link is good too but lack of connecting wifi fast. the experience with tenda was amazing. I

Subject: Just Great
Review: I still wonder why even in 2019 desktop have no wifi. Anyway this little piece does a great job. I am getting 80Mbps DL and 40Mbps UL.

Subject: Just okay
Review: Not bad for the price. However, don't expect speeds comparable to LAN wire. I bought this product to get rid of the long LAN wire I was using to connect to the router for my pc but I get 1/4th of the internet speed (from 80Mbps to 20Mbps) while using it.

Subject: Crap for linux
Review: This product is  perfect for windows . However , I intended to use it with linux and there no drivers availbale for that even on tp links site.So, it is useless for me . Secondly, they do allow a refund nowadays , only a replacement is possible which is frustating.

Subject: Recommended product
Review: Very good product. Worked seamlessly even with Debian Linux. No configuration required.

Subject: Satisfactory product with very small issue
Review: Product is good. Only issue facing some dll error. Thats why giving 4 star. And why company people gives cd to install drivers in this generation too. Can't they download once it connected to internet using basic windows Ethernet drivers.

Subject: Pop-up is disappointing which is not getting removed.
Review: Easy to install and use but pop-up comes on the screen of my PC which is not getting removed even though all efforts have been made. Pop-up is "Windows cannot find 'TWCU exe. Make sure you have typed the name correctly, and then try again."

Subject: A good companion for desktop
Review: Simply fit and forget. I am using this product to give wifi access to my old desktop with jiofi, it works from 25 feet apart across the room, speed drops a bit but nothing significant. Overall a quality product from reputed company.

Subject: System doesn't read the USB all time.
Review: Product is good but everytime the usb on connecting with CPU, getting problem. System doesn't read the USB. But my pendrive etc is working on the same usb port but this device doesn't work. Thats the prb. Don't know if some other guy will face the same issue.

Subject: Worked flawlessly for 2 years. Value for money!
Review: It worked well for almost 2 years without any issues. From past few weeks had some issues with connectivity as it doesn't show and connect to available network. While trying to fix it I broke it into pieces. Anyways done its job for the how much I paid.

Subject: plug and play
Review: surprisingly simple to use. tried with my desktop and just needed to plus in the usb port. gives good speed and connectivity. very small, looks good and effeciently does what its meant to do. a no nonsense product which looks elegant

Subject: Useless
Review: can't receive signal half of the times , and when it does it works for 2hr max and then again loses it.  The speed while it's working is good but this is not reliable at all. Moreover its heats up significantly .

Subject: Compact and useful
Review: Very compact, easy to setup and use. Connects instantly with good range even if the router is in another room.Only setup required was the need to download and install the drivers once.

Subject: The most reliable wifi for computer | Spend 200-300 extra now and just forget all the problems
Review: Have been using this with my computer for 2 years now.I use it for connecting it with mobile hotspot and it does the job.Needs to unplugged and plugged back in once in a month or two.Besides that can't complain.

Subject: Great
Review: Excellent, works like charm, plug n play type anyone with least computer knowledge can get this work. Comes handy to share my jio network from mobile through WiFi thethring and use the internet on desktop

Subject: Sexy in WiFi strength small in size ;)
Review: Super sexy looking WiFi receiver. Working perfect.Very happy though it's a bit costly than other options.Thanks TP Link n Amazon.

Subject: Wifi becomes effective throughout within range
Review: Useful and effective. But sometimes it looses connectivity and on changing port it works well. May be wifi distance affects it.

Subject: great product .
Review: This product has helped me a lot .my pc did not have a wifi capability .After using this i am able to use all wifi services.Even Share it works for transfering from phone to pc .great product .

Subject: Works with Ubuntu. Consistent connection quality.
Review: Works on Ubuntu 14.04. This was my criteria as it is difficult to find good compatible USB WiFi adaptors for Linux. I have used it for a month and  it does not heat up even after several hours of continuous usage. There is no observable fluctuations in connection speed. I had a Wayona Wyn earlier but its performance had degraded after 1 year of usage.

Subject: Device stopped working suddenly
Review: It's not even been 6 months and it stopped working without any apparent reason. I bought it from the seller cloudtail. This looks like a manufacturing defect but I don't have a way of contacting the seller to get a replacement device

Subject: Help required
Review: Dear, actually I need a Bluetooth router to connect my Bluetooth devises with my laptop which is not Bluetooth enabled and I searched the same on Amazon and in that search I find this product from TP link and being a know brand I ordered. But this is an wireless router and not Bluetooth now product is replacement only. So I have option but to keep itPls help

Subject: Not worth Buying
Review: This product "TP-Link TL-WN823N 300Mbps Mini Wireless-N USB Adapter (Black)" is not capable of working and pairing with any wireless devices. Do not Waste time on buying this TPLink products.

Subject: This TP-Link TL-WN725N 150Mbps Wireless N Nano USB Adapter (Black) is not working as expected
Review: This TP-Link TL-WN725N 150Mbps Wireless N Nano USB Adapter (Black) is not working as expected speed or Range.within the distance of 10 or 15 feet it works very slow and gets disconnect

Subject: A good Wifi adapter at good price
Review: As and when i received the order i installed it easily as shown in user manual and after installing the internet speed is good... i didnt faced any problem while installing and using.... nyc product at good price

Subject: Easy to use and having good range
Review: The product was very good and fulfilled my expectationsPro's:-Very easy to useDon't require any driver for windows 10Plug and playableProvided a CD which has drivers for the WiFi adapterCon's:-Range was good only but lags after 10M.

Subject: Superp tp link modem
Review: Easy to installation.better than ordinary wifi dongle to to link modem.wifi band will perfect.thanks for Amazon delivery.

Subject: Dont install tp link drivers if you are having frequent disconnection issue
Review: Its okaayish, had trouble with frequent disconnects...so i uninstalled the tplink driver, and using without any drivers....seems to be working fine now, but slight trouble with signal strength....

Subject: Amazing Product
Review: It was very easy to install.Just run the CD and it picked up the signal.No hassle at all.I m very happy with the product.

Subject: Love this card with Antenna
Review: Love this card with Antenna, the signal reception is really strong when compared to my older card which was causing issues due to low signal strength, this card solved the problem.

Subject: Not so good
Review: My phone has much better reception than this. I had to use my phone's wifi to use internet on my desktop through usb tethering and I can browse really fast. This thing can barely connect from that location.

Subject: Good product
Review: Now been using it since last 2.5 years, still working good. Has good signal as my router is in drawing room and I have been using the to link usb in my bedroom which is one more room away from my drawing room, but still the signal is full. So till now no complaints. Overall  good and durable product.

Subject: Barely runs on 40 MHz. Good to get speed of 72 megs to a max. Not meant for 150 megs
Review: Rarely connects to a 40 Mhz (Wireless N) bandwidth. Driver is outdated and there is no updated one.Very limited features on advanced properties.Support centre is engaged 2 days ago. No Solution yet. (Support is poor)You may have to go through a lot of Drama and trauma after purchasing this. go for the cheap ones that give u same performance for lesser price...

Subject: More than expectations!!! 👍👍👍
Review: This device is amazing.  I am using it on my computer it gives the range and signal which i have not expected in this ranze.  If the signal in phone is 1 point.  then it gives 3. point.  It is 2x more powerful than the normal phones antenas,  it have also 4dbi detachabel antenna.  It can also work as a hotspot and if you more better range then you can also replace this antenna but i don't  need because it gives me 2x more signal than normal wifi adapter or a phone and its speed is also much better than any other.  I am using it since 1 month but i have not any issue with this product.  I loved it.  I suggest you to buy if you want to replace your old wifi adapter or if you want you. 😊

Subject: Currently Stop working
Review: Hi Sir/Madam, I ordered the WiFi of the model number TL-WN823N from Amazon on January 1, 2018, along with a three-year warranty, but the product is not working at the moment, but I requested to exchange my product.

Subject: A good product
Review: Working well. Cannot give you a critical analisis. But have been using it for a month, and quiet satisfied with the range and speed I am getting.

Subject: Good wifi adapter if distance from router is within 30 feet
Review: Good product to cover a small area. Will not advice this product if distance from router is more than 30 feet. In a straight line of sight it may work better, but through walls, not more than 30 feet.

Subject: minblowing
Review: wonderful product very easy to install just run driver cd and everything is ok ,signal strength is extremely goodhighly recomended

Subject: ... you check in market also but this is really nice product. It looks like a small pen drive ...
Review: I will not go with the price thing , you can check in market also but this is really nice product. It looks like a small pen drive and works very nicely. Now I do not need to fix 5-10 m wiring in our home, Very happy,highly recommenced to buy.

Subject: It did not work
Review: There is no way to put a 0 rating, simply it did not work. Amazon Delivery was great as usual, in spite of the product showing a good single, I never could connect to the Wi-Fi. Returned the product. As usual great service by Amazon

Subject: dont buy this product in amazon you will suffer like me. Amazon service is disgusting today i knew
Review: I had purchased this adapter.i got it in 3days and product was defective.I replaced still i got the defective one again.dont buy this product in amazon you will suffer like me.Amazon service is disgusting today i knew.I am very dissapointed with this.too much .

Subject: Not good
Review: It stopped working....pathetic customer service as well....will never buy any Chinese product

Subject: Not Recommended
Review: You cannot stream 720p videos, even if you have 100Mbps connection. This will slow down the speed and if you test it on speedtest website, speed will be good but when you will stream video, it will buffer after every few seconds. Very bad, I disappointed.

Subject: Good Product
Review: I use this for my windows 7 desktop for almost a year now. It's very small and has a premium build quality.However, there is one issue which I encountered which may not be an issue for others that when inserted in the USB port you cannot pull it easily as be being a small profile there is nothing much to grab in order to pull it out of the port.

Subject: Must buy for desktop to use WiFi.
Review: I did not install anything before using it for my desktop, just plugged in and started using it. Works nicely and the best part is, it does not disconnect in between.

Subject: GOOD PRODUCT FOR DESKTOP PC  WHO DOES NOT HAVE INBUILD WIFI
Review: GOOD PRODUCT,THE FIRST ONE I RECEIVED WAS DEFECTIVE AND DID NOT WORK AND THE SECOND ONE IS WORKING FINE,ONCE FINISHED INSTALLING THE DRIVERS THE DEVICE WORKS GOOD WITH WIFI CONNECTIVITY.

Subject: Awesome !!
Review: Without a doubt this is one of the best wifi receivers (adapters) in the market today. Easy to install and speed is awesome. Just go for it.

Subject: Best solution for Wi-Fi network on desktop.
Review: If you are buying this for windows 7 you have to download a file from their website.Other than that it works like charm so far. Reviewing after working with it for 2months

Subject: Great
Review: Great for packet injection but the external antenna is mildly effective as same level of signal strength is achieved by laptop WiFi antenna.Portable and good ease of use...

Subject: You can go for it.
Review: I have 2 mobiles. 1 mobile hotspot is connects frequently but for another one it takes alots of time and i want to restart my hotspot again and again.

Subject: Very nice Product - Value for money
Review: I am using it from last two month and it is working very nice. Very easy to install and use no software required. Signal is also very nice.

Subject: Amazing Fast Great quality just check drivers
Review: You might face a difficulty I stalling the driver your pc might crash mine did but then what you need to do is go to their website and install drivers from there and install version 2 driver it's for Asia and it will work perfectly it's fast and great quality

Subject: SMART WiFi Dongle.
Review: Extreme performance and speed delivered. Supports both Wi-Fi signal capturing and vice versa, hotspot feature works incredible , Offers great download and upload speeds, Additionally provides screen mirroring, and Share it features. Satisfied with the purchase.

Subject: Wifi coverage signal shoul be improved or it should be resolved
Review: I would like to give a review after using the tp link adapter that it has medium frequency for wifi network  and I would recommend that the company should look into this and resolve this problem I had added a photo of it

Subject: DON'T BUY
Review: Product is not good. In the same WiFi network, at the same place, my phone is showing 18mbps speed and my pc which is receiving signal through this device is showing 56kbps.Many time it shows " connected, no internet" then i have to switch it to other port to get internet.It stop working in just 4 month.

Subject: Excellent product. using this for almost 2 years now
Review: Excellent product. using this for almost 2 years now. streaming HD/2K/4K smoothly. no issues at all. However once in 2/3 months it says, 'please plug in an wireless device' and then you would need to unplug and plug in the device once again. This is the only con. otherwise it is delivering excellent performance.

Subject: Plug and play!
Review: Really easy to install infact you don't need any cd to install drivers IF it's windows 10.The range is really nice BUT connection not as good as I thought my 50mbps connection shows 25-30 Mbps otherwise good product also 3 years warranty is amazing

Subject: Very good and easy to use
Review: Excellent product for the money. Very simple and easy to use. Just plug it and use it  Have no issues so far. Great use for desktops.

Subject: Really powerful WiFi dongle
Review: One of the most powerful wifi dongles I have seen. Supports Monitor Mode as well.

Subject: Wow
Review: This stuff is great. Works super fine. Starting from Installation to providing internet, its awesome. Just plug in-install software from provided CD-connect to wifi/hotspot- BINGO!!!!  Use it to your need.

Subject: Good to Buy
Review: Absolutely great, although its been just 3 weeks, and I feel its too early to comment, but feel its good till now, I got no drops and desktop works are seamless as a cabled device would. I feel no reason to give anything less than 5 star. Recommended.

Subject: Good speed
Review: I am using on my macbook pro coz the internal wifi receiver is not working and if I have to fix that, it will cost me a lot. Good solution for me and yes the device works great  .

Subject: TP Link 300 mbps
Review: TP Link never disappoints you!!! Excellent connectivity!!!Just Go For it!!@

Subject: Just Awesome!!!
Review: Working fantastically....just awesome.....my 5 yrs old desktop just became wifi enabled....happy with it....so easy to install....must buy for desktop users 😀

Subject: Value for money.
Review: This is value for money product. I'm using it for my desktop, which is working fine now, though initially I had faced trouble to use it.

Subject: Serves the purpose.
Review: Works well. The range is also good. The only issue is it fits on some USB and doesn't on another. The speed is purely based on the USB speed. My Internet speed is 150 Mbps and what I receive is 80 Mbps.

Subject: Nice and Helpful Product.
Review: It is an Amazing Product. The Packaging was Damn too Good. Much Better Packaging than the other companies. Speed is Good. But i would recommend to use it somewhere near the wifi as is you use it on the back panel of the cpu, it isnt going to catch good speed. Very Nice Product.\

Subject: Bang for a buck
Review: This just beats the competition by a mile. Rather than spending on much cheaper brands which you can't rely on trust me I have faced, just go for this prow being th connectivity is seamless and signals are good and the build quality is not hr best

Subject: Good quality fast wi fi dongle.
Review: Good quality. No need to install drivers Windows 10 has inbuilt drivers for this Wireless USB dongle. Rather than experimenting on unproven wi fi dongles , will recommend this one.

Subject: Value for Money..
Review: Working as expected, For the price range it performs well. Worth considering to purchase this one if need an external wireless device. It is small enough to not bother about device attached to pc or laptop.

Subject: Guys, I have 2 of these with V. ...
Review: Guys, I have 2 of these with V.1.0 which has artheros chipset. This one comes with Realtek. If you are planning to but it for Pentesting then dont.. it won't support kali also the TPlink customer care don't even know how to compile the drivers which they have in there website for Linux.. LOL

Subject: LLOOLL
Review: This is what you get when you people dont update my Review which i did last night, seriously ??  you need more than 8 hours just to update a single review? LOL LOL LOL LOL LOL

Subject: Use on Honda Infotainment system
Review: Very cost effective and reliable dongle for Honda Digipad systems to connect to WiFi hotspot, get real time traffic on navigation.  Much cheaper than dongle available with dealer.

Subject: TP Link is the boss
Review: I have windows 7, so I just installed the driver via CD provided, then plugged the device - Then gave my wifi password - Now working as expected.Very nice product.It has 3 yrs warranty(WRitten on it's package. So, Let's see how many years It works smoothely.

Subject: Does the job perfectly
Review: I got this product today great packaging and delivery was fast, thanks amazon.I wanted to use this product for my desktop to access internet without wire.So I found this tp link adapter on discount (500rs) purchased right away.Now for the setup, the process was quite simple and hassel free .It took me less than 2 minutes to setup and connected my desktop to wifi.I am using Ramptel 300 mbps router with bsnl broadband plan, This adapter is compatible and speed is very good no drops in speed or connection yet.

Subject: It is a nice product and work with Windows fine
Review: It is a nice product and work with Windows fine. But it is not supported Linux system (Ubuntu 16.04). I have tried a lot and search a lot but couldn't figure out finally I came to know from many reviews it doesn't work with Ubuntu 16.04 LTS. .. if anybody has done please let us to know.

Subject: A tiny little monster router!
Review: A very tiny but fast & extremely effective router for using wifi on home/office PC.However due to its ve.....ry little size, it more often gets lost by in my house and I can't find it easily!Still, deserves five stars!

Subject: Bandwith
Review: its bandwiths is good and receiving signal is good. built quality is good. it is too small, that it can be left in the system itself but looking for Bluetooth dongle

Subject: Worth buy
Review: Very good for desktop users to use Wi-Fi without frequent disconnections.Was using a local adapted earlier and was struggling, but with this i can utilise the complete speed of my network without any disconnections.

Subject: Stable and trustworthy product
Review: Works well without any fluctuations, signal is strong, green blinking led light helps to know that it's connected and working

Subject: Average product
Review: Average product I'm using dual band router and the ethernet net speed was around 170-190 Mbps but tp-link dongle only received lesser than 60Mbps

Subject: Small and fast
Review: Nice little adapter with quick setup process and ready to go interface that is easy to use. Excellent replacement for a laptop or a desktop wifi card if it's broken.

Subject: Product stopped working, impossible to claim warranty
Review: The product was working fine for about 2 months but afterwards the problems started. It no longer flashes any LED light and I think is now no longer working. I believe that this is a manufacturing defect but when i went to the TP link service center they were not helpful at all and did not replace/repair the product. Very disappointing!

Subject: Iam able to connect to the internet fine. It is very plug and play for windows ...
Review: I lost WiFi connectivity on my laptop after upgrading to Windows 10. I don’t have the router at a convinient place to plug an Ethernet cable and use it on a day to day basis. So this was my life saver.I’m able to connect to the internet fine. It is very plug and play for windows 10. No need to install drivers or at least I didn’t have to.

Subject: As expected
Review: The wifi signal coverage is better than expected and it's easy to use just like insert and connect that's all... But for kali users.. It doesn't support monitor mode..

Subject: Don't buy this product . Good for nothing
Review: Don't buy this product , it mentioned 150 Mbps , you will not get even 1 Mbps. I am using 20 Mbps broadband and if you the speed test with wired line you will get 20 Mbps and if you connect vai this adapter it's less than 1 Mbps. Worst product

Subject: Awesome
Review: Well for the first 4 days I was very shocked because it continued to stop after some time.And after researching I found that it was not the product's fault. I had to update my windows to properly use it.Now I have no complaints about this. I can enjoy the full speed of 4G with this easy-to-use device.

Subject: For Desktop PC to connect WiFi
Review: You can use to connect your decade old desktop to your WiFi network with this. Mine is windows 7 and It's working on it.  Network is not that fast. I have BSNL WiFi  at home. It catches the network in first floor from the ground floor router. But not that fast. You can use for emergency purposes. Not for fast  browsing or uploading of  huge data.

Subject: Good product
Review: Good product. No drivers required on windows 10. Just plug in and that's it. Great speed.

Subject: Great wifi adapter with long range.
Review: I had an earlier USB wifi dongle which could not connect to the network in next room. This adapted is providing great network connection across three walls in a distant room.Connects easily and simple to use.

Subject: Software version incorrectly written
Review: Worked, but the versioning on the box was wrong, so had to try all versions before settling on version 2 firmware (though package mentioned 3)

Subject: Good product.. Satisfied!!!
Review: It is really a good product with 3 yrs of warranty. Windows Users may face some issues as most of today's laptop doesnot have any cd/DVD drive. In that case, according to the model number you can have the driver software in TP-Link web site. For Linux user, there will be no such kind of issue.

Bought it around 2-3 months ago and I haven't experienced any problems yet. Speed is good. Not as much as it is claimed to be but still it is good.  Easy to carry. Easy to install. Love this product. It has saved my desktop pc.

Subject: Excellent product.
Review: It is simply plug and play product. Just plug it into the usb port of any pc connected with internet, its driver will automatically get installed. Then it will detect wifi. Excellent product.

Subject: Good product, difficult to insert and remove.
Review: Works perfectly. Been using it since I bought it. Absolutely hassle free. The only problem is getting it in and out of USB port is very difficult. Its too tight. Is not as easy as a pen drive. But for most cases people buy this because the internal WLAN card stops working. Nothing spectacular about its range, no matter what they advertise. Works just like the internal card, maybe a bit weaker. But doesnt make a difference for me since laptop is right next to Router

Subject: Works like a dream!
Review: The inbuilt wifi of my Dell laptop malfunctioned and I though of purchasing a USB based external device. Works like a dream! I was told that getting the laptop repaired to restore wifi capability would be expensive~ this is a cost effective solution instead.

Subject: Great product..
Review: I had frequent disconnection but this solved my problem...the speed is good

Subject: Very great product
Review: Got the product delivered today. I'm using it on my Lenovo B460e laptop with Windows 8.1.its working very much fine. Good speed for normal browsing and videos. Overall its a very good product. Worth for its price.

Subject: Installation was as easy as it can be
Review: Installation was as easy as it can be ! The product is working fine. Nicely sealed package, super fast one day delivery with all the contents included as mentioned on the package. Highly recommended.

Subject: Better than cheaper adaptors!
Review: I recommend this as it is only 200 INR higher than cheaper brands which fails to identify WiFi signals. I had few others but those failed after using 5 months.

Subject: AWESOME PRODUCT.. GOOD CONNECTIVITY
Review: Its very nano size and very easy to install...  TP link is a reputed brand... i am getting very nice speed in my desktop by using my mobile Hotspot even keeping it about 25 ft distance from my desktop... Just go for it...

There are different versions of this model. On the packet version is 3.0. But , on the product version is V2. I don't know how it affects performance of the item. I couldn't set up a hotspot using local internet connection on Windows XP computer. But it received internet from another router very easily.

Subject: Excellent Product
Review: Excellent Product. Cute and Small. Has good range. On time delivery.I used this to as a WiFi dongle/adapter for my laptop when the built-in WiFi adapter in my laptop stopped working.The micro CD that came with that had the driver, might not work for 'insert-in' cd/dvd reader. However, the driver can be easily downloaded from the internet.

Subject: I was very surprised at the poor reception quality of this dongle
Review: I was very surprised at the poor reception quality of this dongle. It's very convenient yes -- but you pay the price in terms of coverage -- as it is not able to connect to the wireless network -- from across a distance. My phone can connect but this dongle cant. I purchased the mini version of this subsequently -- which is a much better buy for marginally more cost. I'd recommend avoid this and buy the Mini version instead -- TL WN823N.

Subject: excellent
Review: You might wanna install the Wireless driver from Driverbooster app and then install the TP Link driver, otherwise setup will get stuck @ 54% .Does what it says, excellent packaging

Subject: Excellent
Review: Superb, excellent network speed and all proper support provided by Tp Link

Subject: Satisfied
Review: Working fine on my desktop. No signal drop.I have installed driver came with the packing so dont know if that works with plug & play or not.Overall nice product 👍

Subject: Excellent for hackintosh!
Review: Works great in my Hackintosh Mojave. Highly recommended!The signal strength is even better than in my laptop, so this is a keeper!

Subject: Best wifi adapter
Review: I'm uisng netgear wna1000mv2 and it stopped connecting suddenly, so I ordered this and this if far better than netgear in wifi reception and easy to use. Just install software and it gets connected automatically....Netgear software is a mess..I hope this one serves for long time.

Subject: Very satisfied
Review: I am using it with my laptop. Doesn't require any driver to work with Windows 10. Improves wifi transmission and reception in low signal strength areas of my house. Almost doubled wifi upload speed when sitting in low signal zone.

Subject: EasyToUse
Review: Its very easy to use to laptop and my broadband speed is really good......

Subject: happy with purchase
Review: Product is same as discussed on Amazon.Best in useRecommend goods.Quantity Product

Subject: Worked well. Good wifi signal.
Review: The adapter worked with Ubuntu 16 out of the box (haven't checked with windoze). Has good signal strength and can be continuously used for long periods. Reviewing after more than 2 years of use.

Subject: Plug and Play
Review: Using for a week. Great product and no need to install anything. I Will update if anything changes.

Subject: Best choice for today's 'Work from Home'.
Review: Just plug it on your computer USB port, auto installation will proceed, then select your wifi - that's it. Now forget about it and enjoy surfing smoothly over the period.

Subject: Please dont buy no signal after system restart
Review: Disconnect frequently and if connected no speed at all only 4kb to 10 kb worst product ever I never recommend.I was on holiday the return period also over.

Subject: Good for home use
Review: Average quality. Signal strength is not upto the mark.basic quality. I don't recommend for IT guys.

Subject: Very good quality product in budget.
Review: I bought this for my hp pavilion 15 po77tx. It is easy to install also have driver dvd if you don't know where to get the drivers for that. Also I used it on my Mac os Mojave and it is working with high speed in it.It came with waterproof packaging. With genuine tradmarks and dvd.Overall very good product to buy.

Subject: Worth it
Review: It's really easy to use if you have Windows 10 it will automatically get connected no need to install.im using it with desktop with mini CPU and it's really gud at this price ..u should definitely give it a try

Subject: Awesome
Review: It is very durable and easy to install just plug it in your desktop or laptop and install drivers from provided cd once. Ready to use and does its job well

Subject: Worst product of tplink
Review: Bought on. 22nd September !! Worked only few days, now it's totally dead try to contact tplink servicing but no use. They are worthless, for unnecessarily they wrote in the box of 3years warranty!!

Subject: Best in class
Review: Bought this after some research and found out that people say right about this product. Cheap, easy to use and compact it is! Wifi signal doesn't drop even after hiding behind 2walls. Good buy!

Subject: Nice one
Review: Its great... work with my pc i did not tried it on laptop but works fine with my pc

Subject: Just plug it and you are done
Review: It is a boon for me during this coronavirus lockdown and work from home going on since 3 months.I am able to make my office desktop wifi enabled!!

Subject: Good One From TP LINK
Review: I bought it 1 month ago and it is working properly most genuine product by TP LinkVery good speed of connection no need to install driver if using window 10But having one minor problem of rangeIf you place your hotspot in adjecnt room it's connection automatically disconnectDbi range is not so good as describedOverall it's​ good one from TP LINK in affordable price

Subject: Problem with installation
Review: I couldn't install it as drivers couldn't be indtalled. Although in device manager the hardware could be seen but on installing drivers through CD or from website, I was getting message ' Card not found' hence I returned it.

Subject: Range is Good.
Review: Receiving range is pretty good.I earlier bought Wayona wyn 12 whose receiving range was not enough for my requirement and its also showed false connectivity i.e. showing 'connected' even when it's not connected.Using in desktop with WinXP.

Subject: Waste of money
Review: Very poor quality signal waste of money

Subject: Dont buy
Review: 1.Worst product.2.Signal strength is not good.3.Everytime show connected but not.. I have to manually disconnect then connect. .

Subject: Simple Mac solution.
Review: Elegant compact fix for my Mac. The device is not plug and play. Drivers are provided in a CD and are also available online. The box says compatible till High Sierra 10.13 but I've tested it with Mojave works fine. Warranty period of 3 years is comforting. Super quick delivery from Amazon!!

Subject: Its just worked for one day and stopped working from next day
Review: I have ordered this and i got a defective piece. I replaced it still got the defective piece from same vendor.Now  i am getting information that its not replaceable. Felt very bad with Amazon service. Don't Buy this product its completely waste.

Subject: Rugged and built to last!
Review: I bought this for working on Linux and it runs on it out of the box and even runs on Kali Linux as it uses a generic and powerful chip that can used easily for penetration testing as well. I hung it outside in my terrace for almost 2 years exposed to the elements of nature but it faced them all without a hiccup be it rain, sun or wind. Built quality is fantastic. Just go for it and you won't regret.

Subject: Worked wonderfully
Review: A small size device but powerful one. I needed to have wifi capability on my comp which is an old pc with windows xp. This product worked well after installation. Value for money and with 3 years warranty. The only minus point I think is distance of coverage. (7mtrs) But overall worked satisfactorily.

Subject: perfect purchase with no doubts
Review: Very good and easy to use productreceived with no damagethank you @amazon and thank you @tplink

Subject: Excellent..
Review: I've been using TP Link products for over 10 years and I would say its a very reliable brand with good tech support. The TL- WN722N is a good product but wasn't working well for me as my router is placed about 20metres away from where my work station is. Signal strength says 'fair'..am opting for a device with more range. Still a product worth 5 stars..

Subject: Although, I have no means to quantify but all ...
Review: Although, I have no means to quantify but all I can say is that it has reduced or eliminated the frequent loss of the WiFi hotspot data connectivity between mobile and laptop.

Subject: No support for 5GHz frequency only 2.4GHz frequency
Review: This dongle doesn't get 5 GHz signal :( I couldn't find anywhere in the specs. The dongle is good for 2.4GHz signals. Good Speed and stable connection as well. The size is perfect for all laptops and also desktop. You need to install the drivers for the device to work

Subject: Great Product by TP-Link!!! Highly recommend
Review: Background: I use HP laptop with linux operating system. The inbuilt wifi card was defective and intermittent connection loss was common alongwith low internet speed.After plugging in this wifi adapter the connection is now BLAZING FAST!!! Webpages which used to take 10-20 seconds to open earlier now open with no delay.Also the wifi signal remains steady even when the router is on the floor below me.Great design by TP Link. When plugged in, there is minimal protrusion of wifi adapter body outside laptop edge, making it safe and ergonomic for use on the go.Highly recommend this product, especially if you have defective stock wifi card like me

Subject: Not operational
Review: Replaced it once, still not working. And they are not even giving an option for refund and replacement again. Please kindly look into matter.

Subject: Warranty period
Review: Started using it on 17th oct 2018. Went fine til today. But now not working. It has 3 year manufacturer warranty. Can it be replaced? What can i do about it? Plz let me know....

Subject: Can use it right out of the box!
Review: Setting up the device for use is lucid and doesn't not require any cumbersome installations which is nice. I was able to use it right out of the box. We can use the device on multiple Computers but we've to connect to the Wifi network again when on a different Computer/Laptop. It would've been great if the cap included with it was designed to stay with the device so that we would not loose it. Packaging of the Shipment was decent considering Amazon.

Subject: Works as Expected
Review: My MacBook Pro Network card gave up and Apple Care wanted INR2K to diagnose and another INR4K to replace the card.Bought this for INR499 and works as expected. The installation was also a breeze.

Subject: Worth to Buy
Review: I have been using cheap wifi adapter for years. After that becomes defect. I become confuse to buy  cheap product again.So I just want to try a good quality product now. Its really worth. I'm able to see the differences. If u want good quality then go for it.

Subject: Superb...
Review: First of all lighting fast delivery without prime membership. The product is awesome. I am using it first time and never thought that it would be so easy to use. Just unpacked and plugged , that's it , no more hasslean it started working.

Subject: Great Device
Review: I had to move my modem to middle of the house due to signal issues and my pc was in a different room and I didn't want a LAN cable to move inside the room and this device served the purpose, Speed is same after connecting to pc

Subject: Does the job, Go for it
Review: Received genuine product, nowadays its a big deal. Thanks to seller and Amazon as well for genuine product. Fast connection, good speed. Well built. It has WPS button too, thats a nice addition. Overall 9/10.

Subject: Avoid as too many frequent disconnection
Review: Too many times it disconnects in betweenJust puts me offline and then online againVery poorThe 300Mbps one works quite better than this one

Subject: Very nice product.
Review: Good gain antenna. Can be used with backtrack and comm.view for wifi supported. Win10 supported. Good quality usb cable with it. But driver cd provided is not work for me, so downloaded drivers from offs.site . Arrived fast but amazon didnt delivered to my home. I have to collect it from dtdc courier from my city. So thats why i m giving. 4 out of 5. But product is 5/5

Subject: Easy and worth.
Review: Bought it for my brother's PC.Easy to use, Plug and Play.Worth the cost.Convenient and good quality.Satisfied and recommend.

Subject: Value for money
Review: Value fir money product with good range for detection of WiFi networks, its gave my more than 8+ Mbps from 20+ meters far hotspot point 🤣

Subject: 18 months and still going strong!
Review: Been using this amazing product for 18 months now! Just WOW! Powerful system in a small package. Had no issues till now.Only con that I found is the maximum distance for uninterrupted communication with obstacles is around 5-6m, which is pretty good. But my Nokia Lumia 540 could receive upto 8-9 m under the same conditions.

Subject: Great Wireless High Gain USB Adapter go for it
Review: Great Wireless High Gain USB Adapter.search "Wireless High Gain USB Adapter mrnams" on youtube for more review of it

Subject: Overall Nice
Review: Works fine, being really tiny is added advantage (just plug and forget)... But occasionally  I face connection issues which may be bad for Online gaming.

Subject: Awesome product. Must buy if you looking for one.
Review: Awesome product. Have been using it for 2 years and there has not been a single glitch so far. Very satisfied with TP Link built products. They never fail to live up to your expectations.

Subject: Compact size
Review: Purchased on 25 February 2020 this product is compact in size and delivers a good speed on WiFi.

Subject: Good product.
Review: Good and high speed connectivity though it goes static and hence non functional some times. Needs to be removed from the usb port and re inserted then it again works smoothly. That's the quikest method to get it up I learnt with experience.

Subject: Strongly recommended. Except SoftAp won't work in Win 10
Review: Works perfectly. Detected all my WiFi networks. One star dedcuted because the SoftAP (creating mobile hotspot) does not work on Windows 10. I think that should be mentioned in specifications. Of course this is not frequently used function so I recommend the device.

Subject: Don't except speed provided by device
Review: Product is good, quality, easy to use etc. This is the second time i am using thisOnly bad thing i found is it doesn't provide good speed. Even though the device is have a speed to 1-2Mbps then also the device will provide a speed to 200-300kbps in desktop. Which is pretty bad.

Subject: Wifi adapter
Review: It is not a stable device . Whenever I connect it to the internet every 30 minutes it loses its connection.Overall it is very small  device and easy to connect

Subject: Works well without a hitch
Review: I bought the high gain TP-Link TL-WN722N 150Mbps adapter and its working well, the speed is high and it works even though the computer and the wifi router are in two separate rooms with many walls between them. If you remove the antenna though, it does not detect any signal so I always keep the antenna on, hope this helps

Subject: Great product
Review: Been using this in my desktop pc for almost a year now. Not a single problem till now. Tp link has always been a name you can trust blindly. These days pc's have inbuilt wifi support but if you are not in mood to upgrade your desktop this one is a must for you. Cheers

Subject: Working well with a few issues with linux
Review: I have been using this for a few months and it is working well. It is a bit difficult to use on non-windows platforms but works reliably once configured properly

Subject: Good product.
Review: Good product but prices is it high.

Subject: Did not work.. Twice!!!
Review: Ordered the item for the first time. Got it replaced with the same one, yet received a non-working product. Gave up finally for alternate product

Subject: Weak wifi signal. Rs 50 Cashback not credited
Review: Average device... but Rs 50 Cashback not credited to my Amazon pay account (payment via Amazon upi).Amazon told us the offer is from seller end...

Subject: Awesome device.. don't Think again... Buy It
Review: Its been 5 days of usage and i am completely satisfied with its performance. Link speed is too good.But my only problem is that when i install the utility it doesn't work means the Hotspot is not working with the utility as it shows some kind of SoftAP error. I tried to fix it but in vain. But no worries Windows 10 comes with pre-build Mobile Hotspot so I Removed the Utility and only installed the driver.Overall, its way to good. got it only for Rs.369

Subject: WORST PRODUCT
Review: After one month of use , no signals, the device did not respond in any system.  Tried to install it again  but the dongle  was invisible. So couldnt  reinstall it.

Subject: BEST USB ADAPTER
Review: One of the best Wireless USB Adapters in the market right now. Great functioning and good to have it on my PC because it doesnt look like a extra Segment to my PC. It's very compact and good to have on my PC.Highly recommend it for Wireless USB Adapter users..

Subject: Works as expected
Review: Received the product today. Got this delivered in 15 hours.Easy to install and setup. I tried connecting to my broadband as well as mobile network and works fine with both. Takes a few seconds in connecting and we are good to go. Nice product and a perfect replacement for the inbuilt Laptop Wi-Fi adapter.

Subject: A very good product
Review: A very good product. I am using it on my desktop to connect it to a wireless network (e.g. mobile phone hotspot, Jio, or any other Wi Fi). The installation was very easy.

Subject: product is very good for PC
Review: product is very good for PC, but not for raspberry pi...i was using this for raspberry pi 2 and did'nt recognise it in "iwconfig"...pure waste for raspberry pi....this is because this adapter is very power hungry...so we need to provide extra power to work this thing...

Subject: Lan to wifi
Review: Works great only for single device if use as a wifi router to connect mobiles with computer. It can connect more than one device, I am using it for only two device and I am not satisfied with its performance. I have to disconnect 1 device in order to get desired internet speed.

Subject: No issues ..WORKS GREAT
Review: Working great ... Only issue was with the inbuilt software which gets corrupted every now and then without any reason, works fine otherwise. I'm using it directly with windows 8 inbuilt Wi-Fi enable and without the software . Couldn't check the internet exchange speeds between my jio  net and pc, as mine is an old PC which is slow as it is.

Subject: The only reason i bought it is for packet sniffing
Review: if all you want is to surf the net than there are cheaper options available with similar specs but if you want packet sniffing this is one of the cheapest available

Subject: Best For Low Internet speed
Review: well, I,m on Jio and don,t want to connect my phone to PC every-time i use PCso its the best option i goteven 150 mbps is too much for mesorry jio 400 kbps any day

Subject: Good Product
Review: Very easy to install, I have added this to desktop without LAN cable cost and other things it solved my problem.

Subject: Superb product
Review: Superb product with low prices you can never find in market accept Amazin you can trust.Quality of product is astonishing and durable.It get signals upto 15 feet great for desktop to use Data connection from smartphone.Absolutely reccomend to use these product in home base Network environment.

Subject: Good buy from tp-link
Review: A quality product from tp-link, I bought 'TL-WN823N' for Rs. 499/-. 'TL-WN823N' won't regret me in the future. 'TL-WN823N' has 3 year warranty & it is compatible with Windows, Mac, Linux.

Subject: Nice Product & Product Packing also quite Good.
Review: Product is Quite Nice. i like this product. also Packing is very nice. very useful for using internet via this product.also received CD Drive with this product. i got this product in 2 days. Thank you Seller, Thanks Amazon..

Subject: Excellent product
Review: No doubt excellent, valuable, branded product, no worries for another 3 years.

Subject: Driver issues with Windows 10 and Digisol APs
Review: Uses Realtek chipset. But has constant WiFi connectivity issues with DigiSol router. Also has issues with Windows 10 drivers. If you are using Digisol routers/AP stay away from this.

Subject: Very Bad experience
Review: It's mentioned on the packet that it's provide Speed upto 150 MBPS but actually it's showing 2-3 MBPS on system while I have 50MBPS broadband connection. Also its not showing actual data speed. Very bad experience, it's foolish the customer.

Subject: Download speeds Only 20mbps , upload speed is Fine.
Review: BEWARE !!!! Download speeds only reaching 20mbps , wrong product description. Must not buy !!!

Subject: Just go 4 it...
Review: If you want to connect your PC or Laptop to h wifi connection ... Just go for it.. without any second thinking...Just 1 cons. Wifi router should be near or in same room. Not so far...

Subject: POS
Review: Been using this for over 3 months now. Often gets disconnected and takes ages to connect back. The speed is unbearably controlled. Invest on other reliable and probably expensive wife routers and definitely not something as cheap as this one.

Subject: excellent
Review: excellent product with excellent valuethanks for such a product

Subject: Great product
Review: Works exactly as claimed.. very easy to use and install.. i used it on my godrej dvr to view the cams on my mobile..

Subject: Good buy
Review: TP-Link TL-WN725N is very useful for wifi racking have been using uptill date so go for it ..

Subject: Best purchase of 2017
Review: Working flawlessly and as expected since 20 days for 24hrs a day . Range is good and drivers were installed automatically on windows 7. Awsome product from tp-link.

Subject: DATA PACKETS BEING DROPPED
Review: drops signals, data packets loss ,can't be detected in normal usage, but if you play online games, you will certainly feel the lag ocassionally because of data packets being dropped

Subject: Totally useless product.
Review: Do not spend any money on this product. It is sponsored and has paid reviews. It stopped working within 2 days and does not maintain the wifi-connectivity for more than 2 hours. Look for a more appropriate solution than TPLink.

Subject: Packet injection, monitoring mode
Review: Its very useful device working with monitoring mode and packet injection. Very compatible with kali Linux.

Subject: Good product
Review: It got spoiled in 2 days , but i got it replaced in warranty, but the replacement period was too long , and after i got it replaced its working nicely now.

Subject: Good product!
Review: Easy to use,compact design but speed doesn’t come as mentioned 300 mbps..my computer is next to WiFi router,my internet speed is 200mbps up and down but I get average of 60mbps up and down

Subject: Good for the price but not that good
Review: Its plug and play in Windows and Linux. Says Mac OS support on box but didn't test. Beware of the range before buying. It has only about 6-8 metres of range. Buy it only if you will stay close to the router.

Subject: best for gaming
Review: if you are having problem with those mini wifi adapters , just buy this one , it has very good coverage and never dissconect randomly .  im 15 meter away from my router and still get same speed as ethernet cable .just buy this thing

Subject: Plug and play and excellent range
Review: I thought i would need drivers for this, but windows detected it and started detecting wifi instantly absolutely no installation.Also i expected it to have a short range, but it works (and gets full signal) even if im far from router, its one of the best range ive seen in wireless adaptors. It also has a green indicator led built in inside the black housing.

Subject: A WiFi and hotspot module
Review: It is easy to use.The only problem is installing with CD.The company should provide a cloud link from where we can download the software.The hotspot can be done by choosing any one of softwares like public WiFi, WiFi router etc.By default the desktop access wifi once after installing with CD

Subject: Product Review
Review: Just Got the Product today, was easy and quick to setup for me with all drivers. An no doubt the TP link Routers and Adapters are damn good. Getting a good range of my Wifi connect pretty much working dam awesome for me.

Subject: TP-Link TL-WN722N V3 on KALI LINUX
Review: TP-Link TL-WN722N V3The chipset inside is v2 rtl8188eusYes it supports1.monitoring mode2.packet injection3.AP modeWorking perfectly fine see attached images

Subject: Good Product. Recommended
Review: Good Product. Easy to use. In case your computer is not responding. Check for drivers. It maybe missing. Using two of this for 3 months now. No issues at all. Planning to buy more in future

Subject: Range is good more than 20 metres
Review: works perfectly on my windows 10 desktop.  for people who are wondering if it will work on windows 10. It will work. install the driver from the cd.plug the wireless router. Done. Have been using it for a month. Range is good more than 20 metres. Never disconnects and if you care about aesthetics it looks cool too.

Subject: Don't buy if you're using linux
Review: If you're a windows user then this is a great product.Otherwise no matter what tp-link tells you, they have no dedicated drivers for linux. Their website just says "driver will be released soon". It's practically unusable in linux.

Subject: Best Adapter I have seen yet
Review: Best Adapter I have seen yet.The signal catching power is just awesome. It worth every penny I spent on it.I recommend people to buy this and see the excellent results of its performance.AMAZON you are the best.

Subject: Good
Review: Good, yet to check the range of this, as there is no antenna, don't expect much.

Subject: Perfect for low Wifi signal places.
Review: Perfect device as I wanted . From the router of my place I get signal of usual 7 to 8 Mbps with signal strength 40% but the device boosted the signal strength to 100% with speed of 23-24Mbps.

Subject: I recommend this
Review: The device works great. No complaints with while using it on my gaming machine. No lagg or delay in streaming videos or playing mmo's or Dota

Subject: Didn't worth buying
Review: Didnt worked properly, internet connection on my laptop says 63mbps and by using this on my pc i got 3.8mbps at the same time😑

Subject: Satisfied 👍
Review: Not recommended for long distance connectivity as in couldn't connect from around 30m distance. Installation took lots of time, had to download a brochure. Nonetheless, performance is good, quite fast.

Subject: Poor performance
Review: very poor performance. Totally unhappy.

Subject: Amazing
Review: I'm writing this review after two months and tp link mini wifi works like a charm so don't hesitate before buying this product just buy it.

Subject: Okay
Review: Easy to use, easy to install, works great on my laptop, but it does not work on my desktop for which I ordered it.

Subject: Awesome affordable efficient Product
Review: This product from TP-Link is amazing product. I bought it to connect WiFi on my Honda City Digipad 1.0 which works awesome. It's just plug and play. Need not install anything to use this devise. Thank you for timely delivery Amazon.

Subject: Great quality at amazon cost
Review: High quality product. It comes with was installation, although the CD took quite a time to read on my desktop. Highly recommended. It also comes with 3 years warranty*

Subject: Linux uses, check your kernel and gcc version
Review: If you use Linux with a kernel > 3.2, and gcc > 4.2, this takes some effort to get it right. Once detected, the product is good but the code base to build the kernel module is outdated and needs changes to build without errors. This must be added to the description, just saying Linux is supported doesn't make sense

Subject: TP-Link TL-WN822N N300 Wireless High Gain USB Adapter
Review: I am really surprised with my wi-fi connectivity experience after started using TP-Link TL-WN822N N300 Wireless High Gain USB Adapter. I highly recommend this who do not have inbuilt Wi-Fi in their system instead of going to cheap adapters that are in the market (I myself threw away a Rs 600 adapter that I bought only 3 months back).

Subject: Five Stars
Review: very useful product and works with no issue . i live in hostel and for five rooms we had one router approx so my room was far so only signal strength was really very poor and this caused alot of frustration so i ordered this after my friend bought. i will say this solved my entire internet problem and now my i am getting full  strength signal and internet speed is awesome and very fast. you will get signal of wii fii of three floor above if any router or hotspot is on nearby your neighbour house so its interesting and great product .

Subject: good signals
Review: The Wi-Fi signals in my room are weak, but with this I get better signals. Now disabled onboard Wi-Fi adapter and using it as primary

Subject: Worked fine just for 6 months
Review: Initially it was working fine, but after 6 months it started giving problems like frequent disconnections even though wifi had full range.. And after 14-15 months it completely stopped working

Subject: Works like a charm!
Review: An excellent product...through and through, I am a little disappointed with the WiFi signal strength, but I think that is mostly because of the distance at which the router is...everything else is perfect!Thank you Amazon!

Subject: Technically good, but bulky form factor led to damage
Review: Giving a low rating only because of form factor - sticks out from the side so much that when I left it in, it got bent due to awkward placement of the laptop. Became useless after that and had to get another smaller tp-link product that sits much closer to the edge of the laptop to not repeat the damage. Might work well for people that remove it after each use or who are a bit more careful with moving the laptop around :-)

Subject: Best adapter available
Review: It's the best wireless usb adapter.. Bang on moneyI was having issues with my desktop internal adapter, range problems.. Now all fine.. Exactly give me speed as per my broadband plan.. Stable connection

Subject: Value for money product
Review: This wifi dongle will come handy incase your old system/laptop stops responding to wifi card due to technical upgrade or OS issue.Simply just plug & play this dongle and you are all good with your system for work.

Subject: Best in this price
Review: Range is a issue for this, but it performs well within the range, also its easy to install.My windows automatically detected it and installed the driver in the first time itself.

Subject: Awesome...
Review: i am using it last 1 year running very well now also.Quality is Good. looking wise it's very nice.And connectivity is also very fast.

Subject: Works Fantastic
Review: It works as it should be. Tough the reciving range is not so good but decent. Works well but sometimes it disconnects. Most of the time it works like a charm.

Subject: Simple and Works
Review: Bought this since my OS did not support the native wifi card. It works, and has a decent pickup range. For the dirt cheap price you can get this for, it's a good buy.Does not require any drivers or the like, just plug and play, works on pretty much everything.

Subject: Got defected model... Can't return it
Review: Can't even detect my wifi signal on my pc, I see all the other wifis in my locality except mine. I connect to my home wifi easily on my laptop. Some manufacturing defect or I don't know what. Can't return, only exchange so 1 star.

Subject: Good product
Review: Good useful product that I use to connect my desktop with the Broadband. The router is in a different room and this makes it easier

Subject: After months of wasting my money on horrible broadband connection
Review: After months of wasting my money on horrible broadband connection, I finally unsubscribed from the service and decided to give JioFi a try. This device certainly helped me in that transition and I'm loving it.

Subject: Best WiFi adapter in low budget with 3 yrs warranty
Review: Working properly for me in both windows 10 & 7. Using it for nearly one month. There are no driver required for windows 10 but you have to install the driver for windows 7. For Ubuntu the driver software is not available in installation CD, you have to download it separately from TP Link website.

Subject: Stops working after 2-3 months
Review: The product worked well for first 3 months. Now it stops working intermittently.Currently trying various methods to get it working.

Subject: TP-Link is the best
Review: I am using it since 2016 and it performed excellent. I have ordered the same model again for one of my other device.Thankyou Amazon and TP-Link.

Subject: Poor Speeds
Review: Product is plug and play but gives very poor speeds.I have installed it on my PC just two rooms away (two walls in between) and I average between 2 - 4 Mbps only.

Subject: Satisfied with the Product
